SA10ksmadhlu:2: vaśena grastā hi praṇaṣṭaprajñā nāgārjunādīṃśca mahāmahimnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:7: paramārthagambhīrodadhinayamanavagāhya atra kecidāhuḥ - yuktyāgamābhyāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sidhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:12: prekṣakāstatpravacanamata - mabhyupagamyamānebhyo 'pi niḥsaṃśayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpratipādakaṃ kimapi vacanamupadarśayituṃ na śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:18: trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ parikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannānāṃ kramaśaḥ lakṣaṇata utpattitaḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ sandhāya sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā uktāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:23: [3] dvaitābhāsivijñānamātreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmutpattyādayo vibhajyante, na tu svasaṃvedanamātreṇa /
SA10ksmadhlu:24: dvaitābhāso 'pi mithyā, tena sarvabhāvā api mṛṣā eva vyavasthāpyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:25: parikalpitasya lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvadharmānutpādādayo deśitāḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:28: na khalu sarve bhāvāḥ pratyakṣata evaṃ viviktāḥ [śūnyāḥ] anubhūyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:30: abhāvāya tāvad nīrūpatayā na kathamapi svarūpopadarśanena vijñānajanakatvaṃ yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:33: yat pratyakṣaṃ tadapi yadi sasvabhāvam, tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāpratijñāyā hāniprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:34: yadi tanniḥsvabhāvam, kathaṃ tena sarvadharmāṇāṃ viviktatānubhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:35: atha kaiścid arthāntarā viviktateti pakṣo gṛhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:36: tadā itareṇa tāvat pratyakṣeṇa śūnyatā grāhyā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:37: sarvadharmaḥsvabhāvavādiṣu ye kecana [dharmāḥ] pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante [te] sarve dharmā viviktāḥ pratīyeran /
SA10ksmadhlu:38: sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaviviktatā tāvannāsti kimapi vastu, tasyā api sarvadharmāntargatatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:40: [5] ayaṃ tāvad [viṣayaḥ] sarvajñādīnāṃ yogināṃ pratyakṣeṇa sugamya ityucyamāne 'pi na khalu vidvadbhyastṛptimāsādayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:42: yadi tad yogijñānamapyasaditi ced? tadā kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:44: [6] nāpyanumānenāpi 'sarve bhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ' iti sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:47: svabhāvāśrayarahitaiḥ sarvahetubhiḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:48: [7] paraiḥ siddhatvāt parābhyupagatahetvādibhiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyediti cet tadāpi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:50: ithaṃ yadā parābhyupagatahetvādayo yadi na vāstavikāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:53: yadi te bhāvarupeṇa sanmātrāḥ, tadā na kevalaṃ te paraprasiddhamātrāḥ, tavāpi tatprasiddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:55: parābhyupagatasādhanādayo yadi sanmātrā evābhyupeyante tadā bhāvā api sasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ nābhyupeyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:56: [8] sarvadharmaśūnyatā kutrāpi kenāpi hetunā na sambaddhā, atyantaparokṣatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:57: yadi [sambandhaḥ] siddhaḥ syāt tadā sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:58: pūrvata eva siddhatvād yuktyanusaraṇamapi nirarthakaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:59: [9] api ca, na tāvat kāryasvabhāvaliṅgābhyāṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:61: tvanmate tu etau [kāryasvabhāvau] na sambhavataḥ tathā hi - sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena kasyāpi kenāpi saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānabhyupetatvāt kāryahetustāvanna sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:62: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvena kasyāpi ātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāsattvāt kutastāvat svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:65_0: sā taditaraviviktasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratītau satyāmapi asacchāstraśravaṇavimūḍhamanasā
SA10ksmadhlu:66: tava tu sādhyamānasarvadharmābhāvavyavahārasya pratyakṣataḥ jñānārthaṃ kiñcidapi nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:69: atyantaparokṣāt sarvadharmavivekāt sahānavasthānavirodhenāpi na kiñcidapi sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:70: yadi sidhyet tadā tadviruddhādayo bhāvatvenaiva sidhyeyurityanabhyupetā na syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:73: ye tatrāvikalakāraṇāni tebhyo niyataṃ yasminna bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:75: yad yasmin parihriyate yanna vicchidyate tayorubhayorabhāvayordvitīyo virodho vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:77: tathāvidhau dvāvapi virodhau sarvadharmāniḥsvabhāvavādiṣu naiva sambhavataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:78: gaganāravindādiṣu na santi avikalakāraṇānyapi tathā nāsti atadvyāvṛttyā paricchedo 'pi bhāvaparyantavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:79: sattāvyavacchena yadyapi paricchedo vyavasthāpyate tathāpi kutracit kācit,
SA10ksmadhlu:81: kintu bhavantastāvat kutrāpi kasyāpi vyavacchedaṃ kathamapi naivābhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:82: yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatāpratyāsannāstadā yuṣmāsu kimapyavikalakāraṇasattvaṃ na sidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:85: tadā ta evāsmāsu vastusantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ tadviruddhopalabdhyasambhavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:88: [13] vyāpakānupalabdhirapi vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau vyāpyaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatvaṃ tu tāvanna kasyāpi vyāpyaṃ sidhyatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:89: yadi sidhyatīti cet tad vyāpyameva hi vastutayā siddhaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:90: [14] kāraṇānupalabdhirapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau kāryatvaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva siddho na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:91: yadi siddhastadā yat kāraṇaṃ yaccāpi vā kāryaṃ tadeva vastu syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:92: [15] sarvadharmeṣu kasyāpyekasya niṣedhād eteṣāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapyekaṃ kāraṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:95: eteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ nimittānyapi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyante, teṣāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:96: [17] api ca, nairātmyaṃ yadi sarvadharmagocaratāyāṃ sādhyate, tadā na dṛṣṭāntaḥ prasiddhayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:103: [19] yadi lokaprasiddhā rupādayastadā dṛṣṭānta eva tāvannopalabhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:109: yadi sa nirākriyate tadā pratyakṣasyaiva bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:110: yadi sa badhyate tadā nānumānasyāpi sausthityam /
SA10ksmadhlu:111: pratyakṣasambandhādanuprāptānumānenāpi sa eva kathaṃ bādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:112: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho na bādhyate tadā vastuvādināmeva sausthityam, prāpyasya prāptatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:114: sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sādhayitu yadi kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo hetuḥ pradarśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:116: [22] yadi abhāvasvabhāvastadā asadabhavayoḥ parasparasambandhāabhāvāt kathaṃ sādhayiṣyati?
SA10ksmadhlu:118: yato hi tat sādhayituṃ nānyat kimapi pramāṇamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:119: [24] śabdamātrato 'pi na tat sidhyati, sarvataḥ sarvasiddhiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:120: śabdo 'pi viruddhaḥ, yato hi yadi niḥsvabhāvastadā kathaṃ sa siddhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:125: [26] svato notpadyate bhāvaḥ, yaścānutpannastasyāsattvena kutrāpi hetutvenānupapatteḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:127: yadyaviśiṣṭastadā kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi na yujyate, viśiṣṭasyaiva hetutvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:129: api ca nityabhūtādapi tāvat parānnotpadyate, nityasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:136: ahetuto 'pi notpadyate bhāvaḥ kādācitkatvāt, naivaṃ kathanaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:137: yanna svato nobhayato nāpi vinaṣṭāddhetornāpyahetuto nābhīṣṭānnityāddhetoḥ kāryotpattirbhavatīti tathāvādinastat [sarvaṃ] yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:142: yato hi yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadeva 'para'ḥ ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:143: kāryotpādāt prāk pareti nāmro 'siddhatve 'pi bhāvasya tu naiva hāniḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:147: sa tāvavirodhanayo 'pi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:148: yadyevamasti tadā kasmiṃścidaparasmin drāridrayamūḍhatvādidharmāṇāṃ dṛśyatvena paratvahetoḥ sarvajagaddāridrayādidharmopādānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:149: [28] avyavahitādavinaṣṭāt parāt kāryotpattau kāryakāraṇasamakālikatvaprasaṅgo bādhakapraṇamiti yadi kaścidevaṃ manyate, tadapyayuktameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:155: yathā avyavahitavinaṣṭo bhāva uttarakṣaṇabhāvinā bhāvena saha yugapad vyavasthāpyo na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:157: yathā ca pūrvāparāvyavadhānena pravahamānajaladhārāyāṃ viṣayaikatvaṃ na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:158: tathaiva asyāpi tatsadṛśatvāt samakālikatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:163: yadi vidyamānakāryasyotpattinirṣidhyate tadā tava [pakṣe] ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaśca na syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:167: naiva ca syāt śaśaśṛṅgādyutpattiprasaṅgaḥ tattathāvidhahetūnāmabhāvādanutpatteḥ na tvabhāvāddhetoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:170: anyathā sāṃvṛtike 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve kathaṃ na sarvataḥ sarvotpattirbhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:174: vastubalapravṛttasya hetorviṣasya puruṣecchāvaśena vibhāgo na yuktarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:175: yadi patyakṣabādhitatvāśaṅkayā tasmin hetutvaṃ na pravartata ityucyeta tarhi sa hetureva nāsti, bādhayogyatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:185: tadanantaraṃ yadi sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirna bhavettadā sarveṣāmandhabadhiratvādiprasaṅga ityapi kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:191: anekasmād vā ekasyotpattiḥ [tataḥ sa] viruddho hetusvabhāvātikrānto janakatvenānabhyupagato bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:192: tathāpi vidyamānamātrādanekasvabhāvāt pradīpādeḥ anekasvabhāvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:193: hetubhedo bhedako na bhaviṣyatīti na syāt, hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣasyotpatteḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:194: hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣotpāda iti yadeva kathanaṃ tadeva hetubhedasya bhedakatvapratipādakamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:195: [33] yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa prakṛtyā śānta ityetadanaikāntikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:199: [34] yo hi paramārthato 'san sa saṃvṛtāvapi svabhāvato 'nutpanno dṛśyate, yathā - vandhyāputraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:200: tulye 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve yathā rupādayo 'vabhāsante, tathā śaśaśṛṅgādayaḥ kathaṃ nāvabhāsante?
SA10ksmadhlu:203: ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvāt' ityevamabhidadhānā ye prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti teṣāmapi tathā parairanaṅgīkārād heturasiddha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:207: yadi paryudāsātmake tadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitātvasya bhāvasvabhāvatvenābhyupetatvāttadapyanabhyupagataṃ na bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:210: [37] yacca sarvābhilāpavirahalakṣaṇaṃ tanna kiñcid gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vā, yathā - aśvaśṛṅgam /
SA10ksmadhlu:212: [38] yau hyanyo 'nyāsambaddhau tayornāsti gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, yathā vindhyahimālayau /
SA10ksmadhlu:214: [39] yadyubhe abhāvasvabhāvatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇāpanne eveti manyase cet,
SA10ksmadhlu:220: [41] atrāpi vyāvṛttyā bheda iti manyate cet? tadapyayuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:221: yadyevaṃ svād bhāva eva te syātām, nīlapītavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:222: [42] api ca yathā kenāpi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvahetunā bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:224: heturviruddhaḥ syāt, tathā niḥsvabhāvatvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:226: yadi vijñānamapyanyadharmavat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ syāttadā tadanupādeyaṃ syād vitathatvādanyadharmavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:227: yadyevaṃ syāttadā na syuryogino 'pi, naiva yogijñānamapi syānna ca taistattvapratibodhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:228: naiva teṣāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ syānna ca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:230: [44] saṃvṛtau yogijñānādīnāmabhyupagamād buddhā api viparyastā bhaveyuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:231: [45] api cāsti bhavatāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvapratijñāyāṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ virodho 'pi /
SA10ksmadhlu:232: yathā rupādayastāvat sasvabhāvatve eva niyatā, deśakālāvasthābhedena sphuṭamavabhāsamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:234: [46] agnyādayo ye bhāvāḥ parokṣarvenābhyupagatāste 'pi abhrāntena niyatadhūmādihetunā anumānapramāṇena satsvabhāvātmakā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:235: bhāvānāmutpādo 'pi khalu hetupratyayasāpekṣa eva siddhaḥ, kādācitkatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:236: ahetukasya tu kādācitkatvamapi na yujyate, nirapekṣatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:239: tānyapi samastalokaikacakṣurbhūtena tāyinā svakīyenānāvṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā pratyakṣīkṛtya anyebhyo 'pi samprakāśitāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:242: [48] bhagavatā khalu ye āntarabahyavastūnāmanekavidhāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ samupadiṣṭāste 'pi svabhāvavirahitāḥ kathaṃ yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:244: [49] kuśalākuśalamarmaṇāṃ phalabhūtā devanarakādigatayo bhavantīti svayambhuva upadeśāt kathaṃ na virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:247: [51] sūtrādiṣu āryāṇāṃ mārgābhyāsabalena yā uttarottaralokottarajñānaphalavyavasthā sāpi na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:252: [53] bījādiṣu janyajanakabhāvastāvad āgopāṅganāprasiddhaḥ, ataḥ pratijñāyāḥ prasiddhivirādho 'pi /
SA10ksmadhlu:254: [55] yaśca bhagavatā pratyakṣādipramāṇairbhāvānāṃ sattānirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ, tasyāpi bādhā syāt / yato hiḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:256: no tu nīlam" ityādinā tāvannīlādayo bhāvāḥ kalpānāpoḍhalakṣaṇena pratyakṣapramāṇena jñāyanta iti pratipāditam,
SA10ksmadhlu:257: naiva hi gaganotpalavartīni nīlādīni cakṣurvijñānenānubhūyanta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:259: tat sarvatra nirodhadharmakam" anena sādhyavyāptahetunānumānapramāṇenopadarśitāḥ kṣaṇasthitadharmiṇo bhāvāḥ prasiddhā iti spaṣṭamupadarśitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:262: [57] "dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ salilaṃ ca balākayā" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:263: agnyādayo bhāvāḥ kāryaliṅgena niyataṃ jñāyamānatvānniyataṃ svabhāvamavadhārayantīti suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:265: [58] abhidharmādau ye ṣaḍ hetavaścatvāraśca pratyayā abhihitāste 'pi sarvadharmānutpādavāde tāvatkathaṃ yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:267: [59] sūtreṣu sarve dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ samupadiṣṭāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:268: skandhādīnāṃ bhagavatā kāryakāraṇasvabhāvatvasamprakāśanāt kathaṃ te sarvedharmānutpādatāyāṃ saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:269: [60] yadi skandhadivyatiriktasya kasyacid dharmasya anutpādaḥ sādhyate tadā nāsti [kaścit] vivādaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:271: [61] yadyevaṃ manyate yatsaṃvṛtau pramāṇādīnāmabhyupagamānnaiva eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dūṣaṇānāmavakāśo yujyata iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:273: yato hi yāni pramāṇādīni saṃvṛtāvabhyupetāni tāni niścayena sarvābhilāpavidhuralakṣaṇaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vyāvṛttasvabhāvānyeva vyāhatāni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:274: yadyevaṃ na syāttatadā lokavirodha āgamavirodhaśca kathaṃ parihataḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:276: yadi bhavantastānapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmamātramupacāramātraṃ vyavahāramātramiti pravyāharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:279: [62] api ca, kā nāma saṃvṛtirityapi vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:280: yadi sarvamasaditi kathyate, tadapi na yuktam, parasparavirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:288: bhavataḥ pratijñāyā eva hāniḥ bhavo 'pyutpadyata eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:291: saṃvṛtiviparītasyānutpādasya paramārthatvāt tadā paramārthato 'nutpāda eva syādityasambaddhabhidhānaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:292: upayato 'nubhayata ityeṣāpi kalpanā naiva sambhavati, parasparaviruddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:298_0: tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:298_1: 'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:300: [tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:303: śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:305: dvitīye vikalpe nairātmyakarmaphalādīni nābhyupetāni syuḥ, prākṛtakairapratītatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:306: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:307: yadi sarvamasaditi, tadā pūrvadoṣa eva samāpadyeta, saṃkleśavyavadānāni ca kathaṃ syuriti ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:308: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:311: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:312: pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:313: na hi tāvat saṃvṛtau, teṣāmanirvacanīyatvāt, saṃvṛtisatāṃ vyavahāraprajñapyamānatvācca /
SA10ksmadhlu:317: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta iti?
SA10ksmadhlu:318: tadā paramārthe 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt, tasyāpi vacanīyasvābhāvye vyavasthitatvena abhidheyatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:319: na ca paramārthasatye 'pi saṅgṛhyante, tadvastusattayāḥ sattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:326: [69] atha kṣaṇamātrānantarānavasthānena asthirārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthastadviparītaśca nityārthaḥ paramārtha iti siddhasādhanamevaitat,
SA10ksmadhlu:329: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sāsti paramārthataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:330: sāpi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:331: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ bhāvasvabhāvaiva kācana saṃvṛtirabhyupagantavyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:332: anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
SA10ksmadhlu:337: athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta?
SA10ksmadhlu:342: yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:347: tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho 'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:349: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa sādhayate?
SA10ksmadhlu:350: sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:351: na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:354: yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato 'sadbhāvasyaikasya yathākathañcana nirākaraṇād bhāvasattāyā evābhyupagamaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:361: ataḥ pakṣo 'yam 'na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ' iti na yujyate, viruddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:362: evaṃ bhinnābhinnatvasya anyo 'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe 'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:363: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:367: pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati,
SA10ksmadhlu:369: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati?
SA10ksmadhlu:370: prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko 'pi kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:371: sattvābhāvācca yo hi bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:374: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam?
SA10ksmadhlu:378: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:379: yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:382: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:383: yadyucyeta - vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:388: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:389: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato 'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi siddhasādhanam,
SA10ksmadhlu:391: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:392: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:393: yadyevaṃ na sthitāḥ, tathāpyasattvena niḥsvabhāvāstadā saṅkleśavyavadānau na syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:396: yadyucyeta ādito 'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:398: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:405: sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato 'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:408: atha svato 'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:411: yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:412: yadi parasparaviśeṣānutpādād anutpādo 'bhidhīyate tadā [yadi] tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:413: [kintu] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:414: yadi svabhāvetarakriyālakṣaṇaviyogād anupāda iti? tadāpi nāsti doṣaḥ, sarvabhāveṣu kriyāyā abhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:419: api ca, anyairanekasūtraiścāpi virodhaḥ saṃllakṣyate, tathā hi āryasandhinirmocanasūtre hyuktaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:423: "kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:424: śabdaśo 'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:433: sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo 'bhiniviśya [ye] sāṃkleśikadharmāṇāṃ vaiyavadānīkadharmāṇāṃ cāpyasattve 'bhiniviśante,
SA10ksmadhlu:436: [ataḥ] bodhisattvasya śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāyāmasaddṛṣṭi saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti,
SA10ksmadhlu:439: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo jāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:448: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
SA10ksmadhlu:449: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:450: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā / mahāśūnyatāsūtre 'pi yaduktamḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:451: "asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate" anena tāvad vacanena virodho 'pi samupajāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:452: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko 'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:453: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt "kārakastu nopalabhyate" ityevaṃ na vaktavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:456: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:458: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
SA10ksmadhlu:459: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam / punastatraivoktamḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:462: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:467: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:477: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:479: "kulaputra, yadi [vijñānaṃ] paramārthato nāsti, tadā brahmacaryādīni nirarthakāni syuḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:481: "ye paramārthasato 'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste 'cikitsyāḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:483: "varaṃ khalu kāśyapa, sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevābhimānikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiriti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:485: "paratantralakṣaṇaṃ maitreya, pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ ca saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:486: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati" /
SA10ksmadhlu:489: yadyucyeta kiṃ khalu vastu? yadāryajñānena āryadarśanena vānirvacanīyatvena parijñātam /
SA10ksmadhlu:490: anirvacanīyadharmatāvabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:492: nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:495: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:498: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:500: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante /
SA10ksmadhlu:501: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante /
SA10ksmadhlu:504: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:506: ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ tulyajātīyagotrakairvidhīyamānapratipattiviśeṣānurūpaṃ phalalakṣaṇayānamapi nānā bhavatīti yuktibhirnānāyānataiva niścīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:508: bhagavātā yatkhalu dhātujñānabalānāṃ nānātvamabhihitam, tadapi nānādhātutvaṃ kimiva asat syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:512: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato 'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:513: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
SA10ksmadhlu:515: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:516: athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye 'tulyatvābhāvād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:518: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:522: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam /
SA10ksmadhlu:523: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti,
SA10ksmadhlu:527: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:528: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko 'pi bhavapratīsandhirnaiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:529: tathā hi - mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so 'pyātmagrahaprabhava eveti niyatam abhīṣṭaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:531: tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano 'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [janma] api samucchidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:533: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ nirmāṇasya,
SA10ksmadhlu:541: katipayeṣu [sūtreṣu] - "tathāgatagarbhāḥ sarve sattvāḥ" iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tathatālakṣaṇāyāstathatāyā abhiprāyeṇa vyapadiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:542: ataḥ paramārthatastrīṇyeva yānāni, sarve dharmāśca sasvabhāvā ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:545: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:547: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo 'pīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:549: tathā sati na ko 'pi kamapyāgamamāśrayiṣyati, kenacidapi tadanabhtupetatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:557: tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi nāśrayiṣyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:559: ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayānarghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na /
SA10ksmadhlu:561: sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto 'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo mārgaḥ suspaṣṭamādiṣṭastaṃ kinnāśrayiṣyantīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:562: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva nābhyupagacchanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:563: yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:564: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:565: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:566: phalata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:567: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe /
SA10ksmadhlu:569: te tāvat [śabdāḥ] saṅketābhijñānena vyavahāre vakturicchāṃ dyotayante arthāvasthādibhirabhrāntapuruṣairabhihitāḥ śabdāḥ vivakṣitārthāsambaddhā iti na sarvathā niścetuṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:571: kṣīṇarāgadveṣamohānāṃ śabdā aviparītārthā iti pratipādanena sarveṣāṃ śabdā viparītārthā evati na,
SA10ksmadhlu:573: atastrirupapaliṅgāni parikṣaṇapariśuddhāni ādimadhyāntakalyāṇaniyatāni tāvad vacanāni avisaṃvādakatvād vidvadbhiḥ samāśrayaṇīyānyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:574_1: pratipādayāmāstathāpi yadā āgamārthaṃ vinintayāmastadā vyākaraṇapramāṇatvena sampradarśayāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:577: yadyucyeta ko 'yaṃ paramārtho nāmeti cet? pramāṇopapatraḥ paramārthādhikṛtaśceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:578: athavā yadartho nānyatra netuṃ śakyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:579: sarvadharmānutpādāstāvat pramāṇopannārthaḥ,ato yuktyanvitatvāt sa paramārtha ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:580: āryadharmasaṃgītāvuktam - anutpādaḥ satyam, utpādādayo 'nye dharmā asatyāḥ, mṛṣā moṣadharmakatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:584: na katipayeṣu" avameva punastatraivoktam - "tadyathāpi nāma devaputra,
SA10ksmadhlu:588: evameva devaputra, yaḥ saṃkleśaḥ, sa paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:597: ato yāni ca yāvanti ca paramārthamadhikṛtya anutpādīni lakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni tāni sarvāṇi nītārthatvena grahītavyāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:601: yāvad ye sūtrāntā saṃvṛtipratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante neyārthāḥ yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ paramārthapratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:606: yāvad ye sūtrāntā ātmasattvajīvapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakāravedakān anekarutairasvāmikān svāmina iva nirdiśanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:608: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥsattvanirjīvaniḥpudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāsta ucyate nītārthāḥ - iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:609: sutrāntareṣu 'tāvadanutpādādinirdeśā abhiprāyāntareṇa nītārtha ityabhihitāḥ' - iti yaduktam, tadapi na samyak /
SA10ksmadhlu:610: ekaṃ hi sthitau ātmādinirdeśā api nītārthāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:615: yadyevaṃ tadā kathaṃ bhagavatā āryasandhinirmocanasūtre trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhāṃ niḥsvabhagavatāmabhipretya sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ, proktā iti ced?
SA10ksmadhlu:618: atha cāsacchastraśravaṇābhiniśavaśād viparyastamatayaḥ saṃvṛtau asantamanṛtamapi nityādivasturupatayā samāropya yathā rūpapratibhāsaṃ tathaiva parigṛhṇanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:619: te āropāpavādāntadvayapatitatamatitayā antadvayarahite paramagambhīre paramārthanayasāgare nānupraviśanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:620_0: ataeva tāvad bhagavān 'anutpādādinirdeśaḥ paramārthādhikṛtaḥ' iti nirucya trividhaniḥsvabhāvatābhiprāyapratipādakamantadvayarahitaṃ0
SA10ksmadhlu:620_1: madhyamapathaṃ madhaymapathaṃ prakāśayituṃ nītārthameva mataṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:623: tatravicāritaṃ tāvad vastu yathāpratibhāsaṃ māyāvat pratītyasamutpannam, tacca paratantrasvabhāvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:624: tatrāpi saṃvṛtau māyāvat parapratyayena tasyotpādaḥ, na tu svayaṃbhāvaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:626: 'yaḥ prattyasamutpannaḥ sa svabhāvataḥ śūnya iti vidvāṃso nirdhārayanti /

SA10ksmadhlu:1251: ata eva āryaratnakūṭasūtre proktam - "ye 'sya gambhīradharmasya gāmbhīrya prajñayā avaboddhumaśaknuvānāste tathāgatameva pramāṇaṃ kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1253: yataśca vividhādhimokṣānusāraṃ tathāgatā eva dharmopadeśe pravartante, atastathāgatā eva jānanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1254: nāsmādṛśairjñātuṃ śakyata iti vicārya tatparityāgo naiva yuktarūpaḥ" /
SA10ksmadhlu:1255: ityuvamāgamamukhena sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā eveti siddhā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1259: te dvayābhāsasya mithyātvena tadvyavasthāpitaḥ svabhāvo 'pi mithaivetyabhidadhate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1263: dvayābhāso 'pi yadi mithyaiva tadā katajjñānarūpamavaśiṣyate yat khalu paramārthasad bhavet?
SA10ksmadhlu:1264: anyattad vijñānaṃ grāhakākārarahitaṃ tadarvāgdarśibhiḥ nānubhavituṃ yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1267: tatra na tāvat svabhāvahetukamanumānaṃ sambhāvyate, tatsvabhāvasyaiva sādhyatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1269: yato hi kāmaṃ syāttadadvayaviruddhaṃ tathāpi tena kāryakāraṇabhāva eva na siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1274: yo hi dvayābhāsaḥ, sa tāvad śaśaśṛṅgavannaiva kāryam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1275: ataśca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyabhūtasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya siddhaye paramārthe 'dvayajñānena gṛhyamāṇaṃ kimapi nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1277: yathocyate kaiścit - yo hi yatsvabhāvaviruddhaḥ sa tatsvabhāvaviviktaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1282: na cāpi hetorāśrayāsiddhiḥ sāamānyasukhaduḥkhākāravedakasya dharmiṇo jñānākhyapratītisvabhāvena siddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1284: grāhyākārasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena asattve tadāśritaḥ parikalpito grāhakākāro 'pi niḥsvabhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1285: na cāpi sarvābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, kevalena kartukarmasvabhāvena kalpitatvānmithyaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1287: yadi sāmānyena paramārthato dvayaviviktastvaṃ sādhayitumiṣyate tadā siddhasādhanameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1288: yato hi vayamapi paramārthato dvayasya mithyātvād viviktatvamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1289: yadi hyabhāvasvabhāvaḥ khalu paramārthata ākāravirahitavijñānatvena sādhayitumiṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1291: yato hi vayamapi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpannatvāt sarvavijñānāni tāvat paramārthato 'siddhāni dvayākārasuviyuktānītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1292: yadi vijñānākhyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dvayaviyuktatvena vastusattvena ca sādhayitumiṣyate tadā dṛṣṭāntavayāsiddhatvādanaikāntikattvaṃ hetoḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1294: ekasminneva jñāne jñānatadavabhāsayoravabhāsitatvena avirodho 'pi syādataḥ sādhyavikalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapi syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:1295: yadi vijñānaṃ dvayaviyuktaṃ sidhyati tadā tadbalena svabhāvasattvamapi sidhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:1297: yaddhi dvayaviyuktaṃ tadavaśyaṃ samyag vastusaditi ko hyatra sambandhaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:1298: yato hi yadi tannivartate tadānarthopasaṃhitaṃ pramāṇamapi nivartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1301: tasmin dvaye nānyad dvayamapi sambhāvyate, anavasthāprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1302: śītādisparśaviyuktānāmūṣmādīnāṃ svabhāvavat dvayasvabhāvātiriktaḥ tadviyuktasvabhāvatvena siddhaḥ pratītisvabhāvabhinnastatsamānasvabhāvaḥ kaścidapi dharmī nāstyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1304: evaṃ hi anyavyaktinirapekṣaḥ san yaśca svayamevātmanābhivyajyate, sa pratītilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1305: kāyabhūmiparvatanadī sāgarādayo vividhākārā ye pugato 'vabhāsamānā bāhyārthāste svayamevātmanā abhivyajyamānatvāt pratītisvabhāvātikrāntā eva pravartante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1306: evamapi ye mithyatmanā kuleṣu gṛheṣu ca pravṛttimācaranti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1307: teṣāṃ svakāyopagūḍhadayitayā pratītisvabhāvāliṅganamiva ācaraṇād asaddvayasamāyogo 'yaṃ dūṣitatvānna viśvāsayogyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1308: tathā ca dvayasvabhāvātmakāt priyatamād viyoge sati kimiva nānyena saha samāyogaḥ syādataḥ kevalamasyaiva dharmitvāvasthā naivopapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1310: sautrāntikādayo 'pi jñānaṃ paramārthato dvayasvabhāvaṃ nāṅgikurvanti, aṃśābhāvena virodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1312: ye 'nyaiḥ pramāṇairbāhyārthā nirākriyanta iti bruvate, teṣāṃ jñānamapi kinna tathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1313: ye tāvat kartṛkarmabhāvāpekṣayā prajñaptatvānmithyaiveti kathayanti, tadapyanubhāvaviparītamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1315: tathā sati ye nīlādivividhacittākārā bāhyārthatvena vijñāne 'vabhāsante te karmakartṛvyavahārānabhijñaiḥ kalpanādoṣavinirmukte citte spaṣṭato 'nubhūtā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1317: tasya tāvad viśeṣasya bālaparyantaṃ nāsti suspaṣṭāvabodhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1318_1: mithyaiveti bhavantaḥ svīrkunti tadā vimiktikāṃkṣiṇo bhavantaḥ tirobhūtadvayasvabhāvarahitātmakaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1320_0: ataśca svatīkṣṇaprajñākhaḍgena tāmāsaktiṃ chittvā kaścana tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattikṣaṇo
SA10ksmadhlu:1324: ityevamavaśyaṃ kalpanābhinnasya asatsvabhāvākārāvabhāsasya svīkāraṇāt tallakṣaṇānvita evābhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1326: yadyevaṃ na syāt kathaṃ nāma mithyākārakalpanāsvabhāvoyostādātmyenānubhavo jāyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1328: bhagavatāpi tāvaduktam - "yo hi dharmastathāgatenābhisambuddhaḥ, sa na satyaṃ nāpi mṛṣā" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1330: evaṃ katipayaiḥ pratyakṣaiḥ 'sarve dharmā viviktā' iti jñātumaśakyatvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1331_0: vastveva teṣāṃ viṣaya ityabhidadhānāstāvat praṣṭavyā kiṃ sarvesāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ yāni
SA10ksmadhlu:1331_1: pratyakṣāṇi tāni sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ nāvaboddhauṃ samarthāni utāho ghanājñanatimiropahatamatiyanānāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1332: tatra prathamastāvat pakṣo naiva yujyate, pramāṇābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1333: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣāṇi na pravartanta iti niścāyakasya pramāṇasyābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1337: tasmin apravṛttijñānāṃ sarveṣāṃ strīpurusāṇāṃ cittasantatau pravartamānā yā cittapravṛtiḥ sā tāvānnaiva arvāgdarśināmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1339: ataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣeṇa tajjñānaṃ naiva bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1341: vayamapi hi arvāgdarśibhistathāvidhasya tāvad gambhīradharmatattvasya pratyakṣato darśanaṃ naiva manyāmahe /
SA10ksmadhlu:1343_2: pratyakṣeṇa tāvat sarvadharmanairātmyabodho bhavatyeveti kasmātra sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1346: evamarvāgdarśināṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni timiropahatapratyakṣavad rupādimithyāviṣayakatvād vastusvabhāvaviṣayatvena samyagviṣayatvena vā tāvannaiva yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1348: buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyogināṃ cāpi jñānāni naiva tāvad vastuviṣayakatvena prasidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1349: yasmānna taiḥ kaścanāpi aviparīto vastusvabhāvaḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1351: yaduta sarve tairdharmā nisvabhāvāḥ aniruddhāḥ prakṛtyopaśāntāḥ atyantamajātāḥ atyantamabhūtāḥ atyantaparinirvṛtā eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1353: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad yena dṛṣṭaṃ tadapyanirdarśanamavidarśanaṃ ca,
SA10ksmadhlu:1354: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad darśanaṃ ceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1355: kiṃ punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāvad darśanamiti cet? tadeva yadanidarśanamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1358: iti / ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayāṇāṃ samyagvastutvaṃ na sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1365: teṣu samyagarthabhāvanābalena prāntakoṭikadhyānāvāptito 'nuttarācintyaprabhāvasampannatayā tatpratyakṣeṣu sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ bhavatyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1367: ata eva tat tattvādarśanamityabhidhīyate, na tu niṣedhyasvabhāvasyāsattvamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1368: atha yattāvat pratyakṣaṃ tat sasvabhāvamiti yaduktaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādaikarasatvat pratyakṣamapi paramārthato niḥsvabhāvameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1369: tathāpi yā saṃvṛtisatyāśritā pratyakṣavyavasthā sā sarvā tāvadavyāhayaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1370_0: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi mādhyakāḥ sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ vyāvahārikāṇāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1370_1: yogijñānānāmapareṣāṃ pṛthagjanajñānānām āryapudgalādīnāṃ ye hetavastātānnaiva nābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1371: kintuṃ ye tāvat saṃvṛtito 'pyahetukāste khalu vyavahārato 'pyanutpannā eva, śaśaśṛṅgavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1372: yat sat tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvamapi tāvadutpadyate, māyāpratibinbādivat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1375: tathaiva pratītyasamutpannatve 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāsti vastutāprasaṅgaḥ pramāṇabādhitatvāta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1376: yathaiva hi mantroṣadhādiprabhāveṇa gajādivividhamāyāprādurbhāvastathaiva karmakleśādiprabhāveṇ sattvānāmutpādādayaḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1378: yato hi vividhairhi pratyayaiḥ sā māyāpi vividhaivāvabhāsate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1379: āryaprajñāpāramitāsūtre 'uyuktamḥ "kaścichrāvakanirmitaḥ [kaścit pratyekabuddhanirmitaḥ] kaścid bodhisattvanirmitaḥ kaścit tathāganitmitaḥ kaścit karmanirmitaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1380: anena subhūte, paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitotpannā iti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:1381: bālapṛthagjanebhyastāvad yogināmetadeva vaiśiṣṭayaṃ yatte māyākāra iva yathāvanmāyāṃ parijānanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1385: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:1391: ataḥ saṃvṛtiyogahini yogipratyakṣe tathā sthitatvātteṣāṃ śaśaśṛṅga ivātyantābhāvo naiva bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1394: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi yoginaḥ pṛthagjana iva vyavahāratayā vyavasthāpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1396_1: pratyakṣeṇa parigṛhya taditaraśūnyapratyakṣeṇa tāvadavabudhyate' - ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1399: lakṣanaśūnyatve u sarve dharmāstāvat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvenaivābhyupagamyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1402: yā hi vastūnāmitaretaraśūnyatā sā naiva paramārthaḥ, vyavahārasatyamāśritā khalu sā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1407: yato hi svapnamāyādisadṛśavastūnāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ parasparamabhinnaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1411: "evaṃ mahāmate, itaretaraśūnyatā sarvajaghanyā, sā ca tvayā parivarjayitavyā" /
SA10ksmadhlu:1414: sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāpi satī yogibhiḥ paramārthatayā anupalabdhākāraiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1415: ataḥ sarve dharmā nirābhāsajñānotpattyā jñātā bhavantīti vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1416: ata eva ca itaretaraśūnyatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ parikalpanāmaśrityaivābhihitā, asambadhaiva caiṣā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1417: [5] sā ca 'yogipratyakṣeṇa samyagavagamye' ti kathanaṃ naiva viduṣāṃ rucikaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:1418: yuktyabhāvastatreti yat kathanaṃ tadapi nāsti yuktisaṅgatam, yuktīnāṃ tāvad saṃvidyamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1421_1: spaṣṭaṃ jñānamupajāyate yena te tān puraḥsthitaniva dṛṣṭvā sahasā vividhaśarīrakampādibhiśceṣṭamānā dṛśyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1422: ataśca yathoktatatvaṃ bhāvayatsu tajjñanamutpatsyata eveti sambhāvyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1425: prayogaḥ - ye tāvat kecinnirantaraṃ sādaraṃ bhāvanāmanutiṣṭhanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1428: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1433: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1435: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1436: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:1442: na ca te 'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1446: sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt" ietyavamuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1448: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1451: tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati, iṣṭāpatteḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1455: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato 'nutpannamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1461: yat paramārthato 'sat tad vyavahāre 'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1462: sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati, vyāptyasiddheḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1463: yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1466: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1467: ataḥ sarve 'pi tāvad vyavahārā nirmāṇasvapnādivadaviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1470_1: iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti
SA10ksmadhlu:1472: nirvivādarūpatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1473: tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1474: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti / yathoktam -
SA10ksmadhlu:1484: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1486: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve 'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato 'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1487: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1489: ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1490: teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1491: yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1492: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1493: so 'pi yadi yathābhūtadharmiṇo nivṛttiścettadā niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo 'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1494: yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1495: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1506: 'codako doṣahīnaḥ' ityapi kathanaṃ viparyayadoṣāṇuparipūrite paridhāvanamātrameva, anyatrābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1507: ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa 'svadharma' ityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1512: sādhyasādhanayoriva ākāśādirnaiva vastubhūtaḥ svabhāvadharmīti sādhanabhūto 'yaṃ heturāśrayāsiddha ityapare /
SA10ksmadhlu:1513: tatrāpi ākāśadidharmiṇāṃ vastutāyāḥ kṛte 'pyatra nirākaraṇe sādhyābhāvamātramabhyupagacchatāṃ nāsti ko 'pi doṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1516: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1517_0: na tu dharmāntarayukto dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā
SA10ksmadhlu:1517_1: niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa
SA10ksmadhlu:1529: anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1531: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1534: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vāpi saccāpi na hi vidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1537: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:1538: yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1539: phalata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, pramāṇāpekṣitātvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:1540: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante?
SA10ksmadhlu:1541: yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:1543_0: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo
SA10ksmadhlu:1546: yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1550: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāttadā] tato bahyapradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1551: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1552: buddhau tāvat siddhe 'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1554: yadyasiddha eva saḥ, tadā parakalpitāḥ pradhānādayo 'santa eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1557: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1558: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1559: yato hyanye [vādinaḥ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1561: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:1563: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito 'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1565: yato hi sa bālairbāhyapadhānādyupagṛhītavādiprativādibhirapi taimirikairdvicandradarśanamiva tadabhinnatayaiva vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1566: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1567: tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto 'yaṃ nāsti [kathamapi] buddhisvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1569: ataḥ siddhe 'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1570: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1572: vastusatāṃ śabdādibāhyadharmiṇām anityādidharmasiddhaye [te] bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1573: yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1575: ato 'numānāmeyādayaḥ sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1577: yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1578: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhyasādhanādīn manasikurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1579: tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rūpaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1581: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae 'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1584: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti vyāptaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1586: yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ, kevalasya tattvasyaivāvabhāsamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1587: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1588: tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ sāmarthyābhāvādiḥ kathaṃ na siddhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1592: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro 'pi nirṇayārthaka eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1593: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko 'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1594: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1598: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1599: taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto 'bhyupagataḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1600: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo 'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham /
SA10ksmadhlu:1601: apare 'pi prekṣāvantastāvat tacchabdamātreṇaiva pramāṇairanupapanne 'rthe naiva viśvasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1602: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo 'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1604: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1605: samyakpramāṇabalena vādināmabhīṣṭasādhyasiddhāvapi 'siddhāntābhyupagamāt tebhyo doṣā jāyante' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1611: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko 'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1612: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ 'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1614: ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1618: [7] "yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ" iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati, anabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1619: ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1621: na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād" iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1624: tathāpi katipayeṣu dharmisu sa siddhaḥ, katipayeṣu ca sandigdha iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1625: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1626: tadvadatrāpi māyāmaricisvapnagandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1627: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1628: [9-10] ye kecana - "kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1632: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1635: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ" iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1639: tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1641: "kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam" iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1644: "ādarśadigataḥ pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam" iti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1647: "tadeva rūpaṃ tathaivālambyate" idamapi kathanaṃ naiva samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1653: 'vijñānasyaiva pratibimbākāratayā pratibhāsanādasti sa [ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1654: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1655: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1656: yathoktaṃ bhavatāpi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1659: tathaivānye 'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1660: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1665: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo 'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1666: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1667: tathāpi māyākhapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1668: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1669: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1670: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha /
SA10ksmadhlu:1672: yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu,
SA10ksmadhlu:1675: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1678: evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1683: sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1687: prasiddhe 'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1688: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho 'vabhāsate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1692: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1695: virodhastāvat sāṃvṛtika eva, vastūnāṃ svayameva vinaśyamānatvānnānyakāraṇaiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1696: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1697: pratyayāntaraiḥ kriyamāṇe 'pi vināśe sa svahetubhireva kriyate, nānyakāraṇairiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1698: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate, niḥsvabhāvatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1699: ato 'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1700: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1701: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo 'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1702: ataśca virodho 'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1709: yato hi vṛkṣādayo vyāpakāḥ vastutaḥ sāmānyātmakāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1717: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1718: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante /
SA10ksmadhlu:1719: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne 'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1720: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1721: tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1724: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1725_0: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatāvirāgitākarmaphalasambandhādīnāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:1725_1: sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1726_1: karmaphalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1729: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1732: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1734: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:1735: yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1736: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1737: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1738: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho 'numānena naiva bādhyate tadā prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1740: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1741: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1742: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [abhrāntaṃ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1745: kevalaṃ bhagavata eva pratyakṣaṃ sarvākāratattvagocaram, atastadeva tāvadaviparītamavisaṃvādakam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1746: phalato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1747: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1756: ato yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam, na cānumānabāghitamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1757: yaśca paramārthatvenāropaḥ sa eva bādhyate, tadabhrāntatvābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1761: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1762: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1763: phalano vastuvādino arthābhāve 'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1764: ekato 'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
SA10ksmadhlu:1765: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatāsmāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1767: sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ praśāntavikalpalakṣaṇamuttamaṃ nirvāṇamavabodhayatīti / yaduta -
SA10ksmadhlu:1770: ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadānumānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayāpi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] /
SA10ksmadhlu:1771: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpāpi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānaphalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāphalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā /
SA10ksmadhlu:1773: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1774: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato 'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa [abhāvaṃ] sādhayediti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1777: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane [sambhavatvamiti],
SA10ksmadhlu:1778: yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī?
SA10ksmadhlu:1779: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1780: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1781: anyathā praśānādayo 'śakyaniṣedhābhaveyuḥ, yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1782: yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1783: paramarthato 'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma /
SA10ksmadhlu:1785: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:1787: yadā ko 'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1790: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA10ksmadhlu:1792: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1793: atasteṣu dharmadharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1794: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharmadharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1796: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna duṣanamanabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1799: [25] na ca prasaṅgamātreṇa, api tu samyakprāmāṇenaiveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1800: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām,
SA10ksmadhlu:1805: svabhāve 'smin ubhayamapi prakādvayaṃ paramārthatayā na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1807: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1809: kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1812: nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1815: kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1816: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo 'nyāvabhāsaḥ [pratīyate],
SA10ksmadhlu:1819: atastadākāreṇa jñānenānyasya pratītiriti yaducyate, tadapi nopapadyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1823: yo 'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1826: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadārthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1827: tathāpi pratiniyatārthakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kutrāpi na sidhyati, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1829: jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1830: tadudbhūtatve satīti viśeṣāntaropādāne 'pi anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva,
SA10ksmadhlu:1831: yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1833: anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1834: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe 'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato 'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1835: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:1839: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayāvabhāso nāstyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1844: ariṣṭanīlākṣapītākṣatimirādyapahatanetreṣu dūrasamīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:1845: ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1850: svapnādiṣu tathānīlādiguvatāmarthāntarāṇāṃ vidyamānatve 'pi nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1852: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat samānadoṣatāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1854: samūhaviṣayāṇi tāni jñānānyabhyupeatāni, svapnādivacca tāni sthūlāvabhāsīnyanubhūtāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:1855: na samavāyibhinnaḥ samavāyaḥ samasti, nāpi samavāyakalpanayā tadupacāraḥ sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1863: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [abhrāntaṃ] sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1865: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1866: yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1874: yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:1875: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathābhāso 'sambhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1877: yadi [ākārāḥ] bhinnāstadā arthasadṛśjñānena teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate, bhinnārthatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1889: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1898: yadi sa eva [anubhavaḥ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet? kalpanāmātramevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:1899: naiva tāvanmātreṇa vastunastādṛśaḥ svabhāv san, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1904: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [arthāntarāḥ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1910: tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1913: tataśca 'idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt, kasyacanāpi vibhāgaviśesyānabhyupagamāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1915: kalpanāsvarūpamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo bhaviturmahati,
SA10ksmadhlu:1917: sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1925: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam , viṣayalakṣaṇasya satvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1927: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:1933: yasmādarthāntaragrāhaka ākārāntaro 'pi nāsti, tasmāt kāryakāraṇātmako 'pi nākārāntaraḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1938: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve,
SA10ksmadhlu:1940: anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1943: kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti cennaiva tad yuktimat,
SA10ksmadhlu:1946: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhyagrāhakākārarahitatve 'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā tatra tathānubhūterabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1948: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:1949: tajjñānamapi yathānubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati, ekasmin svarūpadvayavirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1952: yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1957: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1964: yadi sa [grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo 'pi tathaiva mithyā,
SA10ksmadhlu:1965: tathātve kathaṃ sa pratyakṣapramāṇena bhāvasvabhāvaḥ prasidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:1966: yadi viśeṣo [viśeṣyaḥ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:1968: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1969: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatve 'pi na hi tena jñānena kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:1971: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:1972: phalatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1973: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1975: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:1976: ekajñānāvabhāse 'pi 'idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam' iti pratyakṣe na śakyamubhayoḥ sattāsambandhagrahaṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:1978: sambandhagrahaṇābhāve naiva tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇ, anyathā hyatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1979: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:1981: anyānubhavasyānyena niścayo 'pi naiva śakyate kartum, atiprasaṅgādeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:1982: ekasantāne ekānubhavasya prajñaptirapi naiva yuktimatī, ekasantāne prajñaptasya vastūno hyasattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:1986: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo 'pyutpadyeteti cenna,
SA10ksmadhlu:1988: na ca paramārthatastatsvabhāve 'rthāntarānubhavaḥ sidhyati, yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA10ksmadhlu:1994: api ca, kāryahetunāpi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate, anyo 'nyāśrayadoṣaprasakteḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:1998: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2000: yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī'tyucyate, tadāpyetad bhrāntameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2001: taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād 'asmin satī'ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2006: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2010: tathaiva taddhetukṣāsamākālaṃ sarvasattvāntargatāśeṣakṣaṇā vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2012: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2014: 'yadasti tat sat' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so 'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva sidhyati,yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA10ksmadhlu:2017: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam, viruddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2018: ubhayadharmastu tāvad bhrānta eva, asapakṣe 'pi sattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2020: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadāparasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati, tadapekṣitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2029: īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2030: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2031: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate, nānyaphalasyeti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2032: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2034: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatphalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2038: yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2039: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2041: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām /
SA10ksmadhlu:2042: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2043: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2044: kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta /
SA10ksmadhlu:2046: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2047: yadi parebhyo 'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2049: yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante, na tu kāryamātre iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2051: yadi tadaṃśenāpi [kāryāṇi] utpādyānīti cet? na, naikasmin aṃśabhedaḥ sambhavatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2052: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2053: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2056: na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2058: phalataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2060: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2062: ityevaṃ paramārthato 'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2065: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2068: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2075: tasya [vijñānasya] vijñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [vijñeyaḥ] api tad [vijñānaṃ] anusarati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2076: anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2078: nānumānenāpi tat sidhyati, kenāpi hetunā saha tasyāsambaddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2083: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādiphalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2087: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste 'pi paramārthato 'siddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2089: anupalabdhyāpi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2090: api ca, svabhāvānupalabdhirapi tāvannaiva sambhavinī, abhāvavyavahārasādhanaparatvāttasyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2093: phalataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2094: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2095: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ - yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2096: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2098: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2099: vyāpakānupalabdhestāvat pratiṣedhamātraphalatvāt, prekṣāvatāṃ sadvyavahārasya ca pramāṇavyāptatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2100: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2104: tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kutrāpyanvayaṃ vihāya vyatirekamātrena siddherasambhavāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2106: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti, sambandhābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2108: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet? tannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2109: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2111: anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti, kimatenāsti pratikūlam?
SA10ksmadhlu:2112: evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2113: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte 'parasminnapi sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2115: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2116: naitad yujyate, saṃvṛtikajagadarthaviṣayīṇyapi pramāṇani bhavantītyetad bahudhā pūrvaṃ carcitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2120: vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana vivādo na syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2124: tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2125: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2127: ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2131: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2133: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2134: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2136: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2138: [26-29] ye tāvat paramārthataḥ svaparobhayāhetukato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ samyaktayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt, khapuṣpavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2139: yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni, tāni sarvāṇyapi tathaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2140: atra nāsti pramāṇāsiddhatvamapi, yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2141: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2142: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2145: phalataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2148: tadātmanā siddho 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2151: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2152: aviśeṣaṇīyatve 'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2154: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ "ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:2156: sajjñānavat" ityasmin prasaṅge prāṅgārthamaviditvā kecana [prayoge] asmin dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2159: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2161: sajjñānamapi pareṣu nāsiddham, ato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ hetorviruddhatvamapi na staḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2167: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve 'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2169: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2171: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2174: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati phalaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2176: yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vāvabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2177: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2180: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2182: yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2185: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2193: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2194: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2196: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2203: ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate, sa eva anyastattvavilakṣaṇa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2205: atha yaścāsya svabhāvaḥ paścādupalabhyate, sa pūrvamapi paramārthato vidyata iti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2209: iṣyamāṇe 'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2212: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe 'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2214: api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2215: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadāpi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2216: ato 'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata utpattiparikalpanā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2218: yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2220: nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī /
SA10ksmadhlu:2221: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2222: na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sāpi paścānniṣetsyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2223: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2224: ityevaṃ vyavahāre 'pi tāvat svata utpādo 'sambhava eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2226: yadi tataḥ [parataścet] utpādaḥ, tadā sa [parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ] nityo vā bhaved, anityo va /
SA10ksmadhlu:2227: nityāttāvad vyavahāre 'pi notpādo yuktiyuktaḥ, kramākramābhyām arthakriyāyāstatrānu papannatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2230: phalataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo 'rthakriyā sampasyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2236: asattve 'pi tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2237: kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2240: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2244: yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena "naivotpādyante" ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate, nānyatra /
SA10ksmadhlu:2246: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2248: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2249: naitad yujyate, yataḥ 'kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2252: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte, nityasya tāvad vyatirekābhāvādeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2255: avikale 'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte,
SA10ksmadhlu:2257: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [kvacidapi] apekṣā naiva yujyate, sarvātmanā siddhatvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:2259: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo 'rthakriyā na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2261: yato hi tasya tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2262: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle 'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2264: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2266: sāmarthye sati pūrvotpannameva syāditi cet? naiva tāvattad yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2267: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2268: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:2269: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva syāt, anutpādakāvasthāto 'bhinnatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2270: tataśca paścātkāle 'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2271: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2275: ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet? asanneva tadā sa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2278: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2280: yathā te atītādapi vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2283: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ, atītasyāsattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2284: yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2286: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2291: evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
