SA10ksmadhlu:2293: kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2294: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2297: ākṣepamātrā hi kriyā, na cānādhāyikā, abhinnatvāt sa ākṣepakāla evādhānaṃ kariṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2298: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2299: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā?
SA10ksmadhlu:2300: yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [vastu] vinaṣṭamityabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2301: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2302: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2303: yathā mṛte 'pi devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2308: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:2310: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt, kevalaṃ kriyāta eva kāryasyotpādāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2313_1: kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati
SA10ksmadhlu:2315: arthāntarasya pakṣatve anyārthakalpanāyām anavasthādoṣānnaiva [kadāpi] hetutvaṃ sidhyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2316: vastūpakārābhāvād 'asyeyaṃ kriyā' - iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:2318: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2319: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2321: yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2323: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2324: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2325_1: karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva
SA10ksmadhlu:2326: ataḥ keṣvapi 'karma kriyate' iti na sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2333: vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2334: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2335: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2343: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā naiva yuktimatī,
SA10ksmadhlu:2345: yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve 'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2346: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2347: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo 'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2349: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyāpi sarvadā sadeva, ataḥ sā aprāptetyapi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2352: yadi tataḥ [vartamanāt] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:2355: kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2356: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [kāryotpadane] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [kāryam] iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2357: atastasmin [karye] sa hetuḥ kamapi vyāpāraṃ naiva karoti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2358: hetuvyavahāro 'pi tāvat [tasmin] naiva yuktarūpaḥ, yathā phalābhimato naiva heturiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2359: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2360: viṣama [bhinna] kālamiti pakṣo 'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [utpādāt] pūrvameva sat syāt tadānāgatotpādaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2362: yadi [kāryaṃ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2368: atra bhagavatāpi - "asmin satīdaṃ bhavati" iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2369: tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2372: avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā - ityevaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2373: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate, pūrvameva niṣpannatvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:2374: samakāle 'pi hetuto naivotpatsyate [kāryam], tasmin kāle tasya [kāryasya] api satvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2377: tṛtīyakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamapio hetuto notpadyate, dvitīyasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2378: tṛtīyakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamapi hetuto notpadyate, dvitīyakṣaṇa eva vināśāt kāraṇaṃ tāvadasadeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2379: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2381: tato 'vyavahite dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā anubhavārtham - "asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī" tyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2382: na ca kāryakāle kāeanasattāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ, kṣaṇikatvāttadā tasyāsattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2384: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2386: naitadapi yujyate, [kāryakāraṇayo] madhye nāstyevaṃvidham aṇumātramapi kālāntarāstitvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2387: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2390: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2392: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2393: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [kṣaṇānāṃ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2394: [phalataḥ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2396: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo 'pio tatsadṛśa eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2398: tatra prayogaḥ - ye sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavahitāsteṣu pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2400: athaikadeśenāvyavahitatvam, naiva sarvātmaneti cet? tadā kṣaṇasyāpi sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2403: abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2405: tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2406: punaśca, kāryotpattikāle yadi kāraṇaṃ nāsti, tadā kāryamahetukameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2410: yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā [tasya] asattven saha virodha āpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2411: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2413: kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2415: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2418: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2421: vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ [pakṣaṃ] parityajya vartamānahetoravyavadhānena kāryotpattimabhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2422: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2425: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2426: tena taiḥ kimucyata iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2430: tadā 'avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2432: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2434: evaṃ cintyate - svayaṃ vināśavyavahite 'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2436: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarūpatve 'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2438: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2440: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanāvyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2442: asmākaṃ tu [mate] sarva evāyaṃ sadasadbhāvaḥ paramārthato 'siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2444: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto 'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2446: nirodhamātraṃ tāvanna kiñcit, atastena saha paramārthato 'vyavahitatvādicintanaṃ naiva pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2447: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2448: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2452: yadi tulādaṇḍasvabhāva eko 'vayavī dṛṣṭāntatvena pradaśryate, tadā sa khallavasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2462_1: yadapi bhagavatā 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2462_2: eva vikalpo 'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati'
SA10ksmadhlu:2462_3: iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā?
SA10ksmadhlu:2464: yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau /
SA10ksmadhlu:2467: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:2469: itthaṃ tu loke 'pi samakālikaṃ chāyāṅkurādikamapi kāryakāraṇabhāvena jñāyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2475: yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho 'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [pūrvaṃ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2477: na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2479: phalataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām , mithyātvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2484: ato ye ācāryāḥ "na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ samutpadyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2490: utpādanirodha eva tāvat sādhanīyaḥ, na tu vipakṣe badhakapramāṇasadbhāvaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2491: vyavahāre parataḥ siddhatvānnastyasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇasyāpi [bhavanmate paramārthataḥ] samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2493: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha -
SA10ksmadhlu:2497: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ 'vastusabhāvaḥ pratyayeṣvastītyutpadyate' ityumamabhiprāyamādāya dūṣaṇaṃ pradattam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2498: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2499: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo 'pi anutpādādasiddha eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2500: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:2501: phalato 'siddhe 'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2502: [30] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2503: teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā utpādapakṣe pṛthakpṛtham doṣābhidhānānnaiva yuktarūpamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2504: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2506: apare ca ye tāvat - 'ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko 'pi tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva mohayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2508: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [kevalaṃ] śabdaśa upahasanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2509: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'hetuta utpadyanta iti kathayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2510: tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato 'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2515: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko 'pi [dharmaḥ] ahetuta utpadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2516: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2517: yatteṣāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ tadeva hetuḥ, anupakāriṇi apekṣāyā anupapannatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2518: tatra yadupakārakatvena prasiddhaḥ, sa eva tasya heturiti sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2519: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2521: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2527: naiva pratijñāmātreṇa tāvadiṣṭārthasiddhiḥ, tathā sati sarvataḥ sarvasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2528: ato 'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2530: te yathā avicāraramaṇīyatvena prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2535: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [sasvabhāvatvasya] nivṛttiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2539: sā khalu [utpattiḥ] tadvijñāne tathaivāvabhāsata ityapi kathanamyuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2541: tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2543: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve 'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2544: vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2546: paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2547_0: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva
SA10ksmadhlu:2547_1: ato 'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2548_0: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā
SA10ksmadhlu:2548_1: vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā
SA10ksmadhlu:2549: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate, nityatāyā hāniprasaṅgat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2550: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2552: tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:2553: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2558: tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2560: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate, atiprasañgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2564: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2566: yathā āvaraṇasaṃkṣaye tathā vijñānotpattāvapi avighnāpādanasvabhāvo 'pi kriyāyāṃ naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2567: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva [pūrvam] /
SA10ksmadhlu:2569: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2570: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2571: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2573: yadi tatsukṛtvaṃ [vastu]svabhāvabhūtaṃ tadā anityātāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ, pūrvasadṛśatvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:2574: yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam, akiñcikaratvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:2576: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [pūrvaṃ] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2577: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve 'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvāsattvaṃ tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī,
SA10ksmadhlu:2579: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [viṣaye] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2581: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2582: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vāpi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde 'pi na pad [vastu] tasya [vijñānasya] viṣayaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2583_0: yadi [tad vastu] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā svasvabhāvavat
SA10ksmadhlu:2583_1: sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:2585: bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta iti hetostatra [vastuṣu] vyaṅgyavyañjakādīnāmapi sadā avasthitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2588: sadaivābhīvyaktiprasaṅgo 'pi sarvavastūnāṃ dūrnivāra eva, sarvadā avikalasamagrīkatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2591: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2593: ityevaṃ yadi sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ tasya abhāvarūpatvameva, yathā - vandhyāputra iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2595: te 'pi kramayogapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt sarvasāmarthyaśūnyā eveti pūrvamapi [bahudhā] nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2601: ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve 'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2603: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te hetutvenaṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2608: anupakāritve 'pi yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2609: tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2611: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti kalpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2614: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2619: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne 'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2621: kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2629: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2630: phalata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2631: anyathā [yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2632: phalataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo
SA10ksmadhlu:2634: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2635: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
SA10ksmadhlu:2637: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:2638: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2640: ato ye rūpaṃ nityamityudīrayanti, te tāvannaiva prajñāpāramitāmācaranti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2641: kathamiti cet? yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā? ityuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2643: ata evātrāpi parataḥ kāryotpāde tāvat ko virodhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2645: nātra [kānicit] bādhakapramāṇānyapītyādi yaduktam, etat sarvaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2646: satkāryotpādaniṣedhāryamapi bhavatāṃ savidhe nāsti ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaścetyādi yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2648: tathā hi - kiṃ tat yat sadityucyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2649: aṃśaistāvanniraṃśasya siddhirasambhavinīti yasya svabhāvaḥ sarvātmanā niṣpannaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2650: yaśca niṣpannasvabhāva iti tasya paraiḥ[hetupratyayaiḥ] apūrva ityākhyaṃ bhedaṃ kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2654: yastāvattasya sattābhiniveśaḥ, so 'pi tadvadeveti tasyāpi hetvādayo 'sambhavina eveti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2655: vicchinnamātre sādhye tathaiva ca hetornideśe na te abhūtadharmito viruddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2656: yathā sati naiva āśrasiddhādidoṣāḥ, pūrvameva tannirdiṣṭatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2661: yasya kenāpi bhavati bhedaḥ, sa tasya prakṛtiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2664: sa hetusannidhānāt pūrvamapi tathaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ 'hetubhirutpannaḥ' iti kathayituṃ śakyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:2669: tadā paścādapi kathaṃ sa satsvabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2671: yaśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sa tadviruddhadharmiṇi kathaṃ nāma yuktaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2672: yathā amūrtadhārmāntarbhūtaṃ tāvadākāśaṃ kathaṃ nāma mūrtaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2673: utpattyākhyo hi prasiddhaḥ satsvabhāvastāvad asatsvabhāvaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ hi nāma paramārthato 'bhāvena samprayuktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2674: evaṃ vicāryamāṇe yadsat, tasya utpattikriyāvatyāmutpatau kimapyupadeśanaṃ nāma nāsti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2675_0: pṛthaksāmarthyavataḥ kasyāpi bhāvātmakasya hetoranantaraṃ prādurbhāvasya sampratibhāsābhāvāt
SA10ksmadhlu:2675_1: taddhetorasadutpadyata iti loke utpattiviśeṣaviṣayikāyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ abhidhānasya
SA10ksmadhlu:2676: vyavahāramātreṇa tu vastusattve bādhāleśo 'pi naiva sambhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2678: yadi tat sat, tadā naiva tadasat /
SA10ksmadhlu:2679: yo hi paścādapi utpattisvabhāvaḥ, sa tāvadanya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2681: ataḥ 'asadutpadyate' iti yadktaṃ tadabhāvato bhāvasiddhiriti naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2684: yadyetad vastu hetoḥ sāmīpyāt pūrvamudbhūtaṃ nāsti, tadā tasya kaḥ svabhāva ityabhidheyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2685: yadi tadā kiñcidapi nāsti tadā tat kadācid vastutvenābhidhāsyata iticintā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2686: yadi nāsti vastunaḥ kimapi bhāvātmakamastitvaṃ tadā tasya svabhāvo 'sadeveti suspaṣtamabhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2688: evaṃ yo hi pūrvamasan, sa paścādbhāvī kaścana bhāvasvabhāva eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2690: pūrvaṃ nāsīdityasadutpattervyavahārasyāpi hetupratyayābhāsāḥ kathaṃ samyagityabhidhātuṃ śakyāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:2692: yato hi yadi nāstyanyastadā abhūtādanyo bhūto nāsti satsamīpavarttyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2697: ekasmin krameṇa sattvāsattve aviruddheityabhidhānamapi naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2699: yadi samakāle te aviruddhe tadā krameṇāpi kathaṃ te na tathā, abhinnatvāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2700: bhinnadharmiṇi viruddhalakṣaṇasyāviruddhatve 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva krameṇāpi tad bhavituṃ śakroti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2703: anyathā parairapi pradhānādīnāṃ kramaśo mahadādigaṇe parivartanam abhivyaktim vā upakalpayatāṃ vyaktāvyaktādidharmavirodhaḥ kathamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2704: krameṇa vastūnāmutpādakeṣu īśvarādiṣu kathaṃ nāma samarthāsamarthādivirodhodbhāvanaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2705: ye kecana parvatakāyavajrādīn dṛḍhasvabhāvān teṣāṃ śītoṣmādyavasthābhedena kramaśo bhedaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2706: te 'pi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sisādhayiṣavaḥ kathaṃ krameṇa prādurbhavatsu teṣu śītoṣmādiviruddhatvamabhidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2708: bhūtvā cābhāvatvenāvabhāsanta iti vicāraṇād ekasmin kramaśaḥ sadasattvaviruddhatvena vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti kathayantīti cennedaṃ yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2709: yato hi tāmrādiṣvevaṃ dāḍharyamārdavaśaityauṣṇyādīni krameṇa dṛśyanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2711: atastena adṛḍhatayā ye svabhāvatvena sādhayanti, tannaivopapadyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2713: yato hi māyāsvapnādisamā alīkā api [padārthāḥ] abhūtvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2715: kintu svabhāvataḥ sadasatostu krameṇāpi tayoḥ sadasatorvirodha eva / tadyathā -
SA10ksmadhlu:2721: āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre 'pi pūrvaṃ rāgādīn sattvenābhyupagamya punarasattvenāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vaināśikataiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2722: kāryakāraṇabhāvo yadi paramārthata syāttadā evamabhidadhānānāṃ [sā] dṛṣṭistāvat samyag mārgānusaraṇād muktimārgānukūlaiva strānnatvananukūlā /
SA10ksmadhlu:2723: ato laṅkāvatārasūtre yaduktaṃ tadapyaviruddhamevaṃ, tathā hi -
SA10ksmadhlu:2727: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:2728: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:2731: pratiniyatasāmarthyato viruddhamapi svabhāvaṃ kartuṃ naiva pāryate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2732: tathā sati śaśaśṛṃṅgādīnāmapyutpādaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi vidvāṃso bruvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2733: ato hetūnāṃ niyatasāmarthyena vyavasthāpi niyatā bhavedityabhidhānamapi tāvadasambaddhameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2734: saṃvṛtāvapi khalvasata utpattiḥ kathaṃ na vitudhyata iti vicāraṇāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2741: evaṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthasadutpattirnopapadyate, na santi ca tāni [vastūni] asadbhūtānyapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2743: ata eva sarvāṇi khalu vastūni māyāvadeva vyavasthitāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:2745: sato 'sataścānutpannatvāt sarve dharmā anutpannā evetyanekadhā sadasatorniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā anutpāda eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2746: bhagavata 'pi parikalpisvabhāvamabhipretya sadasatorutpattivirodho vyavasthāpitaḥ na tu tattvata ityevaṃ yeṣāṃ kathanaṃ tadapyagre 'bhidhāsyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2747: yo hi vastvātmā paramārthato 'nupanna so 'pi tattvata utpanna ityevaṃbhūto yo parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastamapi ye parikalpitasvabhāvatvenābhyupagacchanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2749_1: sa parikalpitasvabhāva iti cintyate tadā parikalpitātmakayoḥ sadastoryathā utpattivirodhastathaiva
SA10ksmadhlu:2750: tattvatastu utpatteḥ sadasadākārātirikttvena anyākāratayānutpannatvāt sādhāraṇameva taditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2751: ato yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa paramārthataḥ śūnyaḥ, māyādivaditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2752: nāstyayaṃ heturanaikāntiko 'pi yadi viparyayastadā yathoktadoṣadūṣitāni pramāṇānyapi sambhaveyuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2753: yo hi hetupratyayānapekṣya samutpadyate tasya kṛtaka eva svabhāvaḥ, na tu pāramārthikaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2755: ya eva kṛtakastasya naiva prakṛtyā svabhāvo yujyate, prakṛteravikārāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2759: bhūtvā ca vigaccati tau [svabhāvau] parasparaviruddhatvādasambaddhāviti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2763: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10ksmadhlu:2764: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //"
SA10ksmadhlu:2765: nityānityasvabhāvayorupakalpitatvād vastūnām antadvayadarśane prasaṅgamāpādayitum uttam āryaśrīmālāsūtre -
SA10ksmadhlu:2767: 'anityāḥ saṃkārā iti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syāducchedadṛṣṭiḥ sāsya syānna samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2768: nityaṃ nirvāṇamiti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syācchaśvatadṛṣṭiḥ, sāsya syānna samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /"
SA10ksmadhlu:2776: na tu yasya sapakṣe sadbhāvaḥ, sa viruddha iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2780: na hi jñānajñeyābhyāṃ bhinno vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2781_1: yujyata eveti ye kathayantītyanenāpi [kathanena] naiva [hetoḥ] viruddhatvaṃ sādhayituṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2783: māyādiṣu hi mithyātvena [tatra] naiva pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2788: yato 'smābhirapi paramārthata utpattimabhyupagamya naiva hetornideśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2790: na hi siddhāntāpekṣayā dharmihetvādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyata iti tu pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2791: yadi māyādayo vyavahāreṇāpyanutpannā ityabhyupagamyate tadedaṃ lokasyāpi nirvartakatvād asmābhirasyāṃ nivṛttau prayatno naivāstheyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2792: ko 'pi svasthamanāḥ puruṣo yadi 'yathā māyādīnāṃ pratyayā mantrauṣadhyādayaśca dṛśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2794: tattu teṣāṃ [kathanaṃ] viduṣāṃ kṛte 'tyantaṃ hāsyāspadamapamānakaraṃ ceti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2797: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2798: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:2800: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattannasti svabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2801: niḥsvabhāvā hi te bhāvāḥ kadācit sambhavanti na //
SA10ksmadhlu:2803: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattacchāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2808: [31] yadi vināśādayo hi vikalpāḥ paramārthata utpāttau bādhitā ityucyate, tadapi naiva yuktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2809: yā ca bādhābhidhīyate, kāsau? yadi mithyātvena sidhyantītyucyate, tadā vayamapyabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2811: yadi yuktyā te prasidhyanti tadā paramārthata eva bhaveyuḥ, na tu saṃvṛtyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:2814: na hi pramāṇabādhitā mithyāsvabhāvā api māyādayo loke 'prasiddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2815: ato vastusthitaṃ bhrāntaṃ vijñānamapi māyādivalloke prasiddhamityucyamānamapi na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2816: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva māyādisvamiyucyamānamapi na yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2817: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva bhāyādisvabhāvaḥ sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2819: māyādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi jñānasya tadabhinnatayā gṛhītāmithyākāratvenāvabhāsitatvāt tadapi tadvanmithyaiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2820: anyathā satyāsatyasvabhāvayostāvat ko hi sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2824: yadi nāstyātmanā virodhastadā kathaṃ sa pramāṇena sādhayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2826: sa ca pramāṇaiḥ sidhyatyapītyucyate tadā sādhananirbharaḥ saḥ kathamasvīkāryaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2827: na sa virodho 'vabhāsata ityucyate cet, tadāsya visarjanaṃ pūrvamevāsmābhiḥ kṛtam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2829: antarjñeyavādināṃ matānusāraṃ yadadvayajñāne ākāradvayaṃ sāgaraparvatabhūmijalādikaṃ tadaṃśatayopacaryate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2832: anyathā sarve 'pi tattvavedino jāyeran, na ca prativādibhiḥ saha vivādā api jāyeran /
SA10ksmadhlu:2834: na ca satyātmakasya jñānasya pratibhāsamārnairmithyākāraiḥ saha kaścanāpi sambandhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2836: na hi bhavatāṃ mate virodho dṛśyata ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣatastattvadarśitvasambhavād muktyatthināṃ kṛte tattvabhāvānāyāḥ pratyatno nirarthaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2837: yadyevaṃ cintyate yad 'bhrānte vijñāne vividhāvabhāsānāṃ viruddhatve 'pi virodho naiva vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2841: yadyevaṃ na syāt tadā tadanumānaṃ vastubalapravṛttameva na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2843: tatra tāvattattvānyatvādivirodho 'pi nābhidhīyate ' - yadyevaṃ vicāryate tadā sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathaṃ virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2844: mithyābhūte tasmin vastubalapravṛttānumānaviṣayatvāsambhavāt sa viruddha iti nābhidheya eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2845: yadi [virodhaḥ] kriyate tadāvaśyamasmākamevesṭasiddhiḥ, na tu yuṣmākam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2846: yato hi bhavatāṃ tathāvidhena virodhena mithyātvasiddhireva syānnatvavabhāsanirākṛtiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2848: yadi sa mithyātvena prasādhyate tadāsmākameva pakṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:2849: yato vayamapi kāryakāraṇadeśakālahetupratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ satyāmapyapekṣāyāṃ [taṃ] pramāṇabādhitaṃ ca mithyā caiva manyāmahe,
SA10ksmadhlu:2851: tathāvidhavirodhakaraṇena bhavadbhiranyeṣāṃ vastugrahanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ nāma na svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2852: kintu nirdoṣābhidhānāttāvad bhavatāmeva bādhā syāt asmākaṃ tu pramāṇānāmapravṛttirapi nāsti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2853: anyathā kathaṃ nāma saṃvṛtau sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2854: yathaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sidhyati tathaiva samyaktvena abhyupagatavatāṃ mithyāropanivṛttaye kevalaṃ vayaṃ pramāṇāni prayuñjamahe, nānyatra /
SA10ksmadhlu:2855: pramāṇānāṃ prayoge satyapi naiva pratyakṣabādhā pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2856: pramāṇaistāvat kevalaṃ vastutattvasya yathāsthitireva svīkriyate, na tu prasiddhivirodho 'pi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2858: yo hi vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ, prajñaptasvabhāvaḥ, sa eva pramānairbādhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2860: abhrāntapramāṇena yo hi bādhyate, tasya naiva viṣayatvaṃ yujyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2862: yadhevaṃ na syāttadā spaṣṭāvabhāsitayā bāhyārthasya pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi na sa pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2863: phalata ekānekasvabhāvavirahitatve 'pi na sa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sidhyatītiḥ sidhyatīti syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2864: taimirikādiṣu keśamaśakādīnāmavabhāse 'pi pratyakṣato virodhānna kenāpi teṣāṃ mithyātvam asvīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2865: ataḥ svānurūpakāryakāranabhāvena anādikālikaparamparāagatānāṃ sarveṣāṃ janmanāṃ deśākālahetuviśeṣāpekṣitatve 'pi māyotpādavat saṃvṛtāveva vyavasthā kriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2867: teṣāṃ yadā samakālikāsamakālikavyavasthāyāṃ nāsti virodhastadā akṣaṇikatvādidoṣā api teṣu naiva prarvatante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2869: māyāsvapnādisadṛśeṣu dharmeṣu paramārthatastāvat kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādayo naiva hi yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2871: ye rūpasya nityatve 'nityatve vā ācaranti te nācaranti prajñāpāramitāyām tat kathamiti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2872: tad rūpaṃ yadā nāsti tathā sat tadā kathaṃ tannityamanityaṃ vā syāt /"
SA10ksmadhlu:2874: katipayeṣvanyeṣu [sutreṣu] yā khalu saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatā deśitā,
SA10ksmadhlu:2875: sā prasādasaṃskārebhyo mānasamudvignaṃ kṛtvā kramaśo nairātmye praveśāyaiva deśitā /
SA10ksmadhlu:2880: yadi māyādivadaṅkurotpādādiṣu bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyamabhyupagamyata iti cintyate tadā vastunaḥ svīkṛtireva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2881: yato hyevaṃ yāni sāṃvṛtikāni bījākhyāni tāni sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttānyevābhidheyāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:2882: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā kathaṃ bhavadbhirlokāgavirodhaparihāraḥ kartuṃ śakyeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:2883: vayaṃ tu yattāvat sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇebhyaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttaṃ tadeva vastviti kathayāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2884: 'yadi bhavantastathāvidhamapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmnābhidhātumabhilaṣante tadā saharṣaṃ bravantu,
SA10ksmadhlu:2887_0: yato hyevaṃ svapnādau gajāśvagnibhūmivṛṣabhādayo mithyābhāvā ye vividhārthakriyāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2887_1: kurvāṇāḥ parasparabhinnaśarīrānugatā dṛśyante te yathaiva bhinnadeśakālavasthāsu
SA10ksmadhlu:2887_2: dṛśyante tathaiva kiṃ sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttakāyāḥ santi?
SA10ksmadhlu:2889: te yadyekāntena vinivṛttakāyāstadā tevāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2890: yadi te vinivṛttakāyā ityucyeta, tarhi kathaṃ bhavantaḥ prasiddhivirodhasya parihāraṃ kariṣyanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2891: yadyucyeta yathāvabhāsaṃ tatsvabhāvo nāvatiṣṭhatītyataḥ pratītyasamutpannatvājjñānasvabhāvatvena vastutaḥ santīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:2895: yadi jñānasvabhāvastāvad śuddhasphaṭika iva niraṃśaḥ kkacanāpyanavasthito nīlādivividhasvabhāveṣvanavabhāsamāna ityabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:2896: tadā svapnādiṣu gajāśvādīni vastuni tatsvabhāvatvena na samudbhaviṣyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2898: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā tathāvabhāso naiva śakyarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2899: ata eva vayaṃ jñānasvabhāvātītaṃ viparītākāreṇāvabhāsitaṃ mithyātvāllaukikamabhyupagacchāmastathā parikalpitasvabhāvenocyamānameva vastutvena bhrānto viṣaya iti kathayāmaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2902: evaṃ vastvātmanā prasiddhamapi pramāṇena yathāvat sfuṭamavabhāsite 'pi paramārthatayā vastusvabhāvatvena na vyavasthāpayāmaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2904_1: nivṛttamanivṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ naiva praviśatītyucyeta tadevaṃ yathoktaḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:2905: yathā - māyāsvapnādyabhinno vastusvabhāvaḥ pramāṇena suspaṣṭīkṛtaḥ ayamapi paramārtha iti prajñapyate tadā saharṣaṃ prajñapyatāmutsavaścānubhūyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:2908_1: malaviśuddhayarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca pravṛttyarthaṃ ye paramārthanukūlāṃ yathāprasiddhāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2911: [yato hi] te naiva santi paramārthataḥ saditi tu pūrvamevāveditam
SA10ksmadhlu:2915: āgame 'uyuktam - "etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharmaṃ nirvāṇam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2917: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi vastuno yadi niyatadeśakālādyavabhāso bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo 'pyavabhāsanta iti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2919: yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse 'pi kimiti keśādīnāmeva mithyāvabhāsaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2921: yadi timirādihetupratyayādīnāṃ pratīniyatasāmarthyena tathā pratiniyatatvamityucyeta tadā asadvastuni kathaṃ nāma hetupratyayādīnāṃ pratiniyatasāmarthyamiti kathayituṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2923: tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye 'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2925: tathā sati taimirikadṛṣṭakeśādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi pūrvamevāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2926: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā taimirikairadhyālambitānāṃ mithyākeśāṃdīnāṃ hetupratyayā api kathaṃ nāma niyatāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:2927: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2929: yadi jñānasvabhāvaḥ satyatvena siddhaṃ syāttadā keśādayo na tato bhinnā iti teṣāmapi satyatvenāvabodhaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:2931: keśādayastu mithyātvena lokena pramāṇena ca siddhā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:2932: ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:2933: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2934: tathā hi - ye tāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2935: yathā - śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2938: ataḥ paramārthato 'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:2941: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu paramārthasvabhāvarahitatvād,
SA10ksmadhlu:2943: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2944: na hi darśanamātreṇa vastūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ sanniti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2946: ato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ spaṣṭataḥ siddhatve 'pi pramāṇamārgasya jñānābhāvad ye 'nyato dūṣitān nirākartumabhilaṣante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2948: ye paramārthataścatuṣkoṭikotpādarahitāste niḥsvabhāvā e, yathā gagananalinam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2950: evaṃvādinaṃ kaścit 'kathaṃ nāma ekasmādekasyānutpattibodhaḥ' iti pṛcchatīti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:2951: na hi pramāṇanivṛttyā vastusvabhāvanivṛttiḥ, tasya tadutpādakatvatadātmakatvābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2952: yadi kecit 'tadanaṅgīokārāt kaścit tatkhaṇḍayatīti 'kathayantīti cet? tadayuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2953: yadi kecana' īśvarādinā ekena jagad utpadyata iti kathayantīti cet? etadapi na yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2954: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet /
SA10ksmadhlu:2955: na nityāt, tasya anutpannāvasthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvāparakālavad madhye 'pi utpādakatvavirodhāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2956: yadi sa utpādayatīti cet? pūrvāparakāle 'pi tadvadutpattiprasaṅga, utpattisvabhāvānusaraṇāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:2958: nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2962: na hi nityānityābhyāṃ vyatiriktastasya kaścanotpādaka iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2963: ye cānyaiḥ [vādibhiḥ] ekasvabhāvā īśvarādayo jagato 'sya hetavo manyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2966: ata ekasmādekasyotpattirna bhavatīti kathanakāle bhrāntatayā īśvarādikaṃ yannirdiśanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2968: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti, paraistasya nityasvabhāvatvenopajñapitatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2969: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2972: yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ phalānāmutpattirbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:2973: tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2974_0: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyaphalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:2974_1: paścādvartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato
SA10ksmadhlu:2977: hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2978: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [sarvathā] kimapi nāstīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2982: tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya phalaṃ vā tadutpanno veti kalpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2983: kiṃ tadabhāve sa na sidhyatīti, kimarthaṃ sa kalpyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2984: abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti,
SA10ksmadhlu:2985: naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato 'samakālatvam,
SA10ksmadhlu:2986: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:2987: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:2989: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat phalasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:2991: yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi yadā svavijñānamutpadayanti tadā sajātīyānyakṣaṇāni notpādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:2996: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:2997: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3000: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3001: tatra hetubhede 'pi yadi phalabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau syātām, vyabhiciritatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3003: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti, naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3004: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi phalamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3005: yadi sarva evaikaphalotpādane samarthāḥ, na tvanekaphalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3006: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyaphalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3007: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:3009: upakurvantyeveti cet, samarthāntarasya tatrāpekṣitatvādanavasthākhyastāvad doṣa eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3010: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā phalamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3014: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma phalaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3019: ataḥ phalasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3020: hetubhedastrāvat [phalasya] bhedako na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃvidhasya prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3021: yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3023: yadi viśeṣako [bhedako] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3024: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyaphalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3025: yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3026: parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā manvate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3028: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi phalamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3033: tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ phalaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
SA10ksmadhlu:3035: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyaphalanāṃ bhedakā api bhaviṣyantītyucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3036: tadā tathaiva te sāmānyaphale 'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3037: yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3038: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3039: yato hi te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3041: punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3050: ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti, akārakatvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:3051: tenaiva tatphalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3052: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3053_0: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte
SA10ksmadhlu:3053_1: vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [vastūni] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni
SA10ksmadhlu:3053_2: nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3054: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3058: aparaśca svabhāvalakṣaṇastadā nivṛtte 'pyasmin svabhāvenaivotpādakalakṣaṇastāvannivartata ityuttaraṃ khalu samīcīnaṃ syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3059: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3060_0: teṣāmayameva svabhāvo yat svabhāvabhede 'pi ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve 'pi
SA10ksmadhlu:3060_1: ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:3060_2: parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3061: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarūpam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3062: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede 'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3064: svabhāvabhede 'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ dattaṃ syāt?
SA10ksmadhlu:3065_0: tenaiva phalamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3065_1: kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato 'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3067: vyavahāre 'pi ekasamūhāntargato yadyekaphalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3068: kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3070: na tu śakramūrdhādyanyairiti ye kathayanti, tatra kā yuktiḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3071: samuho 'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3072: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3073: tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3074: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:3075: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ phalānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve 'pi pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3077: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3083: viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3084: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3085: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3087: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā?
SA10ksmadhlu:3088: yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3091_0: tathaivābhinne 'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau
SA10ksmadhlu:3091_1: kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān
SA10ksmadhlu:3091_2: vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva
SA10ksmadhlu:3093: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3095: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3096: phalataḥ paramārthato 'nekebhya ekasya phalasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3099: tadā hetubhedābhāve 'pi phalasya bhinnatvāt phalasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3100: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra phalāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [kaścana] viśeṣaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3102: ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto bhūtvā phalaṃ notpādayatīti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3103: tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte phale 'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3104: ekasmādanekasya anekasmādekasyotpattiryā kathyate, kiṃ sā naiva dṛśyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:3105: [arthāt dṛśyata eva], atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3107: darśanamātraṃ tu naiva tāvat pramāṇamapi, svapnavanmithyābhāsamānatvāat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3108: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3111: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3113: vividho 'pi svabhāvo yadyekaḥ syāttadā sarveṣāmevaikadravyatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3115: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:3117: ekaikasya phalasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3122: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo 'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3126: ācāryo 'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya cotpattiḥ prasidhyati tathā dṛśyata eveti kathayāgāsa /
SA10ksmadhlu:3127_1: pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo 'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān,
SA10ksmadhlu:3132: teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthakpṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3134: sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3136: tadā naiva tāni saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3139: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3140: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate, sā teṣāṃ vipratītirevetyabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3145: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo 'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3147: yato hyekasvabhāvatāyāmanutpādāsthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvakālavat paścātkāle 'pyutpādakasvabhāvatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3148: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3150: yato hi tattvatāyāṃ samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3151: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ phalapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3154: yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3155: yadi na syāttadābhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3157: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kālapuruṣapradhānabrahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3158: te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3159: yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3163: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te 'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3165: api ca, bhinnabhinnasvabhāvenānubhūyamānasya tāvat kṣaṇikatve 'nirvacanīyatā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3166: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye 'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3167_1: teṣāṃ svīkṛtā syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā
SA10ksmadhlu:3169: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ parikalpayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3172: yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [vastuni] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo 'nubhūyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3174: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3177: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3178: yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3179: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham,
SA10ksmadhlu:3180: tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3183: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarūpaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3184: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3185: anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġ
SA10ksmadhlu:3187: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3190: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3191: ata eva svayūthyāḥ 'sañcitālambanāḥ paścavijñānakāyāḥ' iti svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3195: tatra vividhatāyāṃ [vicitratāyāṃ] svamatasthāpanārtha tāvadanekajñānotpattikalpanamapi nāsti samīcīnam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3198: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare 'pi [siddhāntavādinaḥ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3199: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3208: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3210: te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3211: te 'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3212: phalato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3213: yadi tathā na sidhyati, tadā anekasvabhāvo 'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3214: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3215: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3222: yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3223: ityevaṃ ye kecidindriyairagamyā ātmādayaste tadvyāptakramikakāryayogādidharmāṇāṃ svīkṛtyā ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvenaiva prasiddhāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3225: tādṛśānāṃ vastūnāṃ pratiṣedhāya dharmiṇaḥ parīkṣāyāḥ sarvatrānivāryatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3227: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] tadā tanniṣedhāya bhavatāmapi arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogalakṣaṇo hetustāvat kathaṃ siddho bhaviṣyatīti codanā kathaṃ na syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3228: paraparikalpite dharmiṇi tathāvidhakramikakāryāṇāṃ svīkṛtyaiva tadvyāptadharmāṇāṃ niṣpattestanmatamātrāśritatvād dharmiṇastasya tāvat parikalpitatvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3229: anumānena tathā jñāne satyapi nāstyevānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, svataḥ pramāṇatvāttasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:3230: vyavahāreṇāpi tāvat sādhyavyāptasādhanasya siddhatvāditi pūrvameva samyaguktatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3234: ekasvabhāvahitatvena siddhe satyanekasvabhāvarāhityamapi sutarāṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3237: yatkhalu paramārthato 'sat, tat saṃvṛtito 'pyasadeva, kriyatāpyaṃśenānanubhāvyatvāt, śaśaśṛṅgavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3244: āropasvabhāvātmakatvāt sarvapratyakṣāṇāṃ kathaṃ hi tairekānekasvabhāvayuktatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyata iti cintāyāṃ heturyamatra māyākārāpratyakṣānumānābhyāmanaikāntika eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3245: yato hi māyākārajñāne tāvad yo 'yaṃ gajādyākārāropastasmin svabhāve paramārthato nabhiniveśo jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3247_0: evaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣasya nirākṛte 'pi bhāntikāraṇe kadācidanyāropākārasvabhāvavataḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:3248: tathaivānumānajñānamapi yaddhi sāmānye tāvad vastulakṣaṇe samāropākāram,
SA10ksmadhlu:3249: tadapi vastutathatāyā yathāvajjñānasvabhāvatvāt tadviṣayakaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇasadbhāvādanaikāntika eva hetuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3250: nāsti tadviṣayīti kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yuktm, aścaśṛṅgavad vastūnāmabhyupagamābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3251: tarhi kathamiti cet? māyādisvabhāvavaditi, māyādivat pratyakṣatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3253: vividhaprakārādiliṅgaiḥ sarve yadyekasvabhāvarahitatvena sādhyante tadā te 'nekatvasvabhāvarahitā api sidhyanyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3255: ekastvaṃ vānekatvaṃ vā sarveṣvākāreṣu vyāptam, parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāttayoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3256: vyavahāre ghaṭādiviṣayaparicchedena puruṣā atulyasambaddhān vyavahārayogyānatyantaṃ paricchedayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3260: paricchedo yadi naiva viccinnastadā sa nāstyeva, parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāttayoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3267: vyāpyasya vyāpakasya vā vastunaḥ svato 'siddhatvādasiddha eva sa heturiti kecana /
SA10ksmadhlu:3268: tathaiva dharmiṇyeva kevale vyāpyasadbhāvasidhyarthaṃ vyāpakanivṛtyā vyāpyanivṛttirasiddhaivetyapare /
SA10ksmadhlu:3270: evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakādisarvavastūnāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvṛttyāśritatvaṃ prasādhya paścād vyavasthā kṛtetyapi pūrvamāveditameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3271: atyantaṃ samīpavartini vyāpake niyataṃ vyāpyaviśeṣajñānaṃ naiva bhavatītyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3277: ato vivādāspadībhūteṣu sarvadharmiṣu sāmānyena sādhayitumiṣyamāṇatvāt kathamimau dvau [vyāpyavyāpakau] ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritāviti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:3278: ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritatve 'pi [mithaḥ] sāpekṣatvād bhinnāveveti nāsti doṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3282: [36-37] yaḥ khalu sādhyaḥ, sādhako vā tau prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvau, na vā tathāsvabhāvau?
SA10ksmadhlu:3285: ye sarvābhilāpavigatalakṣaṇāste na kathañcanāpi bodhyā bodhakāśca,
SA10ksmadhlu:3291: [40] abhinnasvabhāvā api kecana na bodhyabodhakabhāvāpannāḥ, vṛkṣaśākhāvat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3297: atastasmin kathaṃ na sarva vivādā āpateyuriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3298: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3300: bhāvā yatra vicāryante na te santi savabhāvataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3304: yadi niḥsvabhāvatā tatra naiva bodhyata iti cettadā aśvaśṛṅgasyāpi bodhābhāvaḥ kathaṃ nollikhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3305: bhavatāmabhilāpalakṣaṇarahitāḥ sarva bhāvā na manāgapi bodhyanta ityādiprayogeṣu vidyata eva sādhyasādhakayorniṣedhasvabhāvaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3308: ato nāsti prayogakauśalamapi sarvesāṃ vastunāṃ niścetavyaprasaṅgālliṅgasyaiva vastuno bodho na kenāpi svīkriyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3310: ato niyatameva liṅgaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bodhyate, sādhyākārasya niyamenotpādakatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3311: liṅgaṃ tāvat kalpanayā bodhakatvena vyavasthitamiti yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3312: ato niḥ svabhāvatve 'pi niayatatadākārasya sādhyakāraniścayotpattau hetutvād bodhakatvena kalpanāyāṃ nāsti kaścana doṣaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3314: ākāśaniṣedhakasya liṅgasya nitarāṃ kalpitatvādeveti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3316: tatrāpi yadi vastubhūtaḥ sambandha evaiko hetutvena kathayitumiṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3320: dvayorniṣpannayoḥ [vastunoḥ] svabhāvaḥ śliṣṭa iti nopapadyate, svasvabhāve vyavasthitatvāttayoḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3323: ekatve sati naiva dvayāśritvaṃ tāvad yuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3324: yadi sa sambandhibhyo 'rthāntara iti tadā svasvabhāvavyavasthitatvāt kathaṃ nāma sambaddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3325: yadi nāstyarthāntara iti tadā kevalaṃ sambandhināveva syātām /
SA10ksmadhlu:3326: ataḥ sambandhastāvat kalpanāmātrātmaka eva, na tu vastvātmaka iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3327: yāni hi sambandhodbhūtāni lakṣaṇāni tānyapi kalpanātmakānyeva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3330: api ca, yadā kāryasvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ tadā apekṣāvirahānnaiva tasya kūtracinnirbharatvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3331: ato nāsti tasya kenāpi saha sambandhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3332: apariniṣpanne 'pi tasmin kāraṇena saha sambandhakāle vidūre sthitatvādasambaddhameva tat syāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3336: hetuṃ badhnāti kāryeṇa kāryaṃ na, tacca kīdṛśam //
SA10ksmadhlu:3342: asambaddhatve sati abhedābhāvāt kathaṃ tādṛśī yaktiḥ, prayujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3343: abhede sati tadātmaka eva sambandha iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3344: vastumātra eva tādātmyasambandhaḥ, na tvanyatreti cet? ayuktametad, abhinnaparyāyatvāttādātmyasya /
SA10ksmadhlu:3346: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā 'abhinnatvād' ityapi vaktuṃ na paryeta /
SA10ksmadhlu:3347: tatra 'abhinnatvad' ityayaṃ heturyadi paramārthādhikāreṇocyeta tadā anekāntika eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3348: yato hi kṛtakatvānityatve yadyapi paramārthato naiva bhinne tathāpi bodhyabodhakavastuṣu tāvat te dṛśyete /
SA10ksmadhlu:3349: yadi vyavahāre 'pi tayornāsti bhinnatvamityucyeta tadā asiddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3351_0: evameva śabdādidharmiṇi yadā akṛtakatvādito nivṛttirniścīyate tadā nityādito 'pi
SA10ksmadhlu:3351_1: nirvṛtterniścayanāt paramārthato bhinnatāyā abhāve 'pi nivṛttiviśeṣāpekṣayā kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3351_2: bhinnavyavasthāyā upakalpanād bodhyabodhakavastuvyavasthā tāvat kriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3352: itthaṃ yadā vastūni sāmarthyataḥ pratimbivad ekānekasvabhāvavinivṛttāni bhavanti tadā paramārthasvabhāvato 'pi teṣāṃ nivṛttirniyataiva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3354: ata eva ca tatra bodhyabodhakabhāvo 'pi sambhavatyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3356: yathā nityaṃ tāvd vastu arthakriyāsāmarthyavirahād vastusvabhāvena rahitaṃ sādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3358: [41] yadapi atadvyāvṛttiviśeṣeṇānayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ tad vastu syāt nīlapītādivattasvabhāvatvāditi kathanaṃ tāvadasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3360: kṛtakatvānityatvayorbhedo vyāvṛttyocyate, kintvetāvatā na tad vastu /
SA10ksmadhlu:3361: yathā nityavastuniṣedhāya arthakriyāsāmārthyarahitatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ca vyāvṛttikṛtaviśeṣe satyapi naiva vastu,
SA10ksmadhlu:3363: yatkhalu nīlātmakaṃ pītātmakamiti nidarśanaṃ tadapi paramārthe tāvad vastunyasiddhatvādayuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3364: ye 'smin asatpakṣatvena doṣamāropayanti, tadapi naiva yuktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3365: yato hi nayo 'yamasanniti kathanamātreṇa tāvat paramārthe vastuni na kimapi siddhaṃ bhāvati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3367: tatra buddhau pratibhāsamāno yo hi pūrvodito dharmī,
SA10ksmadhlu:3369: kintu paramārthe vastuni sa naiva yuktarūpaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3371: ekānekasvabhāvarahitaṃ khalu paramārthaṃ vastu naiva kiñcit,
SA10ksmadhlu:3373: sarve khalu padārthāḥ ekānekasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptā iti tu pūrvameva prasādhitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3374: māyādibhiravyatiriktāḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvā hi bhāvāste yadi 'vastu' nāmnā vyavahriyeran,
SA10ksmadhlu:3381_0: [42] evaṃ yathā ekānekasvabhāvalakṣaṇo hetustāvannairātmyaṃ sādhayati tadvadabhāvadharmini
SA10ksmadhlu:3381_1: dharmivyāvṛttisādhakatvād viruddho 'yaṃ heturiti yaduktaṃ tattu atyantaṃ pramāṇānabhijñatāmātrameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3384: kintu yadā sa [dharmī] niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhyate tadā siddhe 'pi vādino mate kathaṃ tāvad viruddho heturbhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3385: niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ hi sādhayitumiṣṭāyāṃ vastusvabhāvo dharmī naiva sambhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3387: ataḥ sādhyasādhanābhyāṃ yathokto dharmī avastubhūta eva sammat ityasmāt kāraṇāt tena hetunā tāvad vyāvṛttireva sādhayate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3389: yathāyaṃ heturnairātmyaṃ sādhayati tathaiva abhāvadharmyapīti keṣāñcit kathanamasambaddhameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3390: yato hi yena kāraṇena tāvannairātmyasya abhāvasya ca dvayordharmayorviruddhahetubhyāṃ siddhirucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3398: dṛśayate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
SA10ksmadhlu:3399: phalato niḥsvabhāvatāsādhanārthaṃ na ko 'pi heturiti yatkathanam, tasyāpyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3400: [43-44] yadi vijñānamapi itaradharmāṇāmiva niḥsvabhāvameva syāttadā mithyātvād yogibhiranyadharmāṇāmiva tasyāpi parityāgaḥ kariṣyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3401: yadyevaṃ kariṣyate tadā na ko 'pi yogino bhaviṣyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3403: nāpi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ naiva ca teṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3404: anena khalu hetunā sarvāsāṃ vyavasthānāṃ vilopa eva syāditi yatkathanaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3405: yato hi prasaṅgastāvadayaṃ yadi satyābhiniveśaparityāgārthamucyate tadā saharṣamucyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:3410: yanmithyā tat sarvathā parityājyamityetasya naiva kimapi kāraṇamupalabhāmahe,
SA10ksmadhlu:3413: te yogibhiḥ parityājyā iti kathanaṃ tu yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3414: parantu ye tavat sākṣāt paramparayā vā svaparaprayojanaprasādhakāḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3415: kṛpālūnāṃ parahitakaraṇopāyabhūtāsteṣāṃ kathaṃ sarvadā parityāgaḥ kartum śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3417: te sarve viparītaparihāradvārā parityājyā api yāvatsaṃsāramaparityājyā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3418: te yadyapi māyākāra iva sarvān mithyābhūtān jānanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3420: nāsti teṣu viparyabhūtā āsaktirapi, samyagrūpeṇa teṣāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3423: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3426: bhāvo 'pi tāvanna grāhyo na cābhāvo 'pi parityājyaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3430: kṛpāparādhīnacetaso yogino 'pi parahitārthaṃ vividharūpeṇa gajādimithyānirmāṇādikaṃ sādhayanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3431_0: tatra mahākaruṇāparādhīnatayā ye pareṣām aśeṣahitasukhopāyaśālinaḥ prajñālokena vidhvastasakalakleśāndhakārāḥ
SA10ksmadhlu:3432: itthaṃ sameṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi hetupratyayasāmagrīpāratantryena māyāvat sambhavantyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3433: hetumantaste na bhavanti vastusantaḥ, anvayāsiddhatvānmāyādinā bhrantatvācca /
SA10ksmadhlu:3439: saṃkṣepato bhagavatām apratisṭhitanirvāṇahetustu karunā prajñā ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:3440: kṛpayā hi tannirvāṇāvabodhe 'pi te naiva tasya sākṣātkāraṃ kurvanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3441: prajñayā tāvat sarvasaṃkleśahetoḥ sammohasyānavakāśāt saṃsāradoṣagandhenāpyaliptāḥ santo naiva saṃsāre patanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3444: ata eva ca sā bodhasattvānāṃ mārga ucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3447: "api ca, śāriputra, śūnyatānimittaṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mārgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3450: tadā nūnaṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā eva bhavanti /"
SA10ksmadhlu:3452: tadyathā - acintyasāmarthyavattvād yogino yathā vastūnyavabhāsante tathā karatalāmalakavat saṃvṛtiparamārthākārābhyāṃ sarvākāraṃ
SA10ksmadhlu:3455: sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ niruttaraṃ lokottaramaśesadharmanirābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ tattvāvabodhakaṃ bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3457: ato yathā sarvākārajñānādau vastuvyavasthā kṛtā, sā na praṇaśyati, paramārthe 'bhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3459: sarve dharmā nirmāṇaniva bhavanti tadā bhagavati nirvāṇe ca kimantaram?
SA10ksmadhlu:3461: katham? bhagavataḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirmāṇavad bhavanti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3463: nirmaṇasya tāvannodbhavo nāpi parinirvāṇaṃ kimapi bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3464: itthaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu nirmāṇamivādhimuktiṃ vidhāya prajñāpāramitāyāmācaritavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3466: [45] ye hi rūpādayo bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsu spaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣeṇāvabhāsante te niścayena svabhāvena yuktā ityataḥ pratijñā tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bādhiteti yat pūrvamuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3471: kintu naiva svabhāvaḥ paramārthatayā siddha iti pūrvamāveditam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3473: yadi bhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvat pratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvamabhyuopagamyate tadā naiva tena bādhā yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3474: timirādyupahatalocaneṣu vidyamāne 'pi dvicandre na tena ekacandrādibādhā yuktimatī /
SA10ksmadhlu:3475: yadyabhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvena tthā [bādhā] abhyupeyate tadā tannaiva sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3477: na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇaṃ na jihṇa pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3478: pramāṇa yadyeta bhaveyurindriyā kasyāryamārgeṇa bhaveta kāryam //
SA10ksmadhlu:3479: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jaḍāḥ svabhāvena avyākṛtāśca /
SA10ksmadhlu:3480: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva arthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu karyam //
SA10ksmadhlu:3482: te naiva kimapi vastu sattvenālambante / yathoktam -
SA10ksmadhlu:3484: te rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ tathāgatacakṣuṣā anupalabdheṣu sarvadharmeṣu sattvenābhiniviśante ".......iti vastaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3485: pratijñāyā anumānenābhāsa iti yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3486: yato hi nānumānena kimapi vastu svabhāvataḥ sidhyati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3500: vastūnāṃ kūrmaromādivadabhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ yadi naiva pratijñāyate, tadā kathamiti cet?
SA10ksmadhlu:3503: mahāmate, sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā ityapi bodhisattvairnaiva pratijñā kāryā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3504: tadā kimiti cet? ābhāsanirābhāsalakṣanatvād bodhisattvaiḥ sarve dharmā māyāsvapnādivannirdeṣṭavyāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3507: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na vidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3509: ataḥ 'sarve dharmā vyavaharamātrāśritāḥ', ityasmin bhagavannirdeśe nāsti kaścana virodhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3543: na tveteṣāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvam' - iti nirdeśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3544: rūpata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ ye tāvad dharmāsteṣāṃ na staḥ saṃyogaviyogāvapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3545: yato hi rūpaṃ adarśnam apratigham alakṣaṇameva asattvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3546: sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ te kevalaṃ tathāgatena lokavyavahārārthaṃ kathitāḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3547: lokasaṃvṛtau ye pinaḥ prāptirabhisamayaḥ pañcagatibhedāste 'pi pūrvata eva paramārthato na santi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3548: paramārthe tu karmāpi nāsti karmaphalamapi, saṃkleśo nāsti, nāsti vyavadānamapi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3553: anyatra bhagavān spapne sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchā tadabhāve saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca mithyaiveti kathitavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:3555: yato hi mahāyānāndanyatra bhagavān teṣāṃ [āryasatyānāṃ] upadeśaṃ kṛtavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:3557: "yaduta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgadho mārgaśceti naiva santyāryāṇāṃ satyāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:3563: sarvadharmāṇāmadvayasamatāyāṃ yā khalu mārgabhāvanā, saivāryāṇāṃ satyamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3565: tattu śrāvakānadhikṛtya saṃsārodvignamānasānāṃ kṛte pudgalanairātmyapraveśāryaṃ tāvadanityādisvabhāvatvena kevalaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3567: [53] yaśca tāvajjanyajanakasvabhāvo janeṣvāgopālaṃ prasiddhastena prasiddhivirodhadoṣo 'pīti yaduktaṃ tadapyasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3569: yadi prasiddhastadā te naiva santi sādhāraṇajanāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3572: sā pramāṇāntargaveti cet? tadā tadvirodhaparihāreṇa tadbādhāyā api parihāraḥ kṛta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3573: [54] yaccāvaśyaṃ parotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogābhilāṣeṇa tato 'vaśyamutpattyabhyupagamāt svavacanavirodha ityuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3575: niyatotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogānnaiva tataḥ paramārthato niyatotpattirabhyupagatā bhavati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3577: paramārthata utpattiniṣedhenātra vastūnāṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva paramārthataḥ sādhayitumiṣyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3579: ato yadyapi hetubhyo niyatatayā pāramārthikī utpattirnaiva bhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3582: [55] yacca bhagavatā - "cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam" - ityuktam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3584: anyatra tu - "na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇam" ityādinā ṣaḍindriyāṇāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣiddhameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3586: lokasaṃvṛtau tu sarva [dharmāḥ] saṃvidyanta evetyevaṃvidhaṃ bhagavān svābhiprayaṃ suspaṣṭaṃ prakaṭitavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:3589: bhagavatyāmapyuktam - kiyatā bhagavan, upalambhaḥ, kiyatā ca tāvadanupalambho bhavatīti?
SA10ksmadhlu:3590: bhagavān āha - yāvad dvayatā tāvadupalambhaḥ, yadadvayaṃ tadevānupalambhaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3593: nāma rūpaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇam ityat ārabhya yāvad buddhatvam anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiḥ buddha iti tāvad dvatetyupadideśa /
SA10ksmadhlu:3594: punaśca, yāvad dvayasaṃjñā, naiva tāvadānulomikī kṣāntirityapyuktavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:3596: ato vyāvahārikacakṣurādīnābhisandhāya draṣṭṛtvato jñātṛtvaparyantamātmaprasiddhestaddṛṣṭiniṣedhāryaṃ pudgalanairātmyapraveśābhiprāyeṇa cakṣurādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3597: ata eva cānābhāsina ākāśetpalasya nīlatvādivadime nīlādirūpāṇāṃ ye sāṃvṛtikā ābhāsāste 'pi na santyatyantābhāvarūpāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3598_0: [56] 'yat kiñcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakam' ityamunānumānena
SA10ksmadhlu:3598_1: samyaktayā kṣaṇikatvena sthitasya vastudharmiṇaḥ siddhirninirdaṣṭeti yaduktaṃ tadapyutpādavināśadharmiṇo
SA10ksmadhlu:3600: yato hi bhagavatā saṃskārāṇāmutpādavināśasvabhāvasya samyaganudarśanaṃ taduddeśaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāmiva nirmitasadṛśamityuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3602: āryadharmasaṃgītau hi tathāgatena bhayasthānasya parihārārthaṃ vyavahāre cotpādanirodhau tāvaduktau /
SA10ksmadhlu:3606: yathā mayā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3610: sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā nāsanna sat punaḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3612: yacca tāvat saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvam, tadapi naivopapannamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3615: tatrātītāḥ saṃskarāḥ, ye tāvanniruddhāste bhūtakāla ityucyunte /
SA10ksmadhlu:3617: ye ca pratyutpanne pṛthagutpannāste vartamānakāla ityubhidhīyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3618: vartamānakālotpannāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni na sthitāni nāpyasthitānīti parijñāyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3625: ataśca kṣaṇikatā tāvat kalpanāsvabhāvātmikaiva, tadādimadhyāntānāṃ bhinnasvabhāatvādityupadideśa /
SA10ksmadhlu:3628: trayātmakatvāt kṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3630: tadapi sūtrāntareṣu sakalasāmagrīsamavadhānāt samutpadyamānānāmagnidhūmādīnāṃ sāmānyena niṣedhaparakameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3631: ato naiva tat paramārthamadhikṛtyoktamiti nirdiṣṭameva pūrvam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3633: samavāyād vinirmukto buddhayā bhāvo na gṛhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3637: samavāyāt pṛthaṅ nāsti na cānyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:3639: na skandhā dhātavo naiva sarve dharmā alakṣaṇāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3646: ataḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpitasvabhāvatvāt tatsvabhāvasaṃgṛhītāstāvadagnidhūmādayo 'pi kalpitasvabhāvā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3649: [58] abhidharmādau yaḥ khalu hetupratyayādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ, so 'pi saṃvṛtireva, na tu pāramārthikaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3650: paramārthastu yadā na kasyacanotpādastadāhetukatvaṃ tāvadanupapannameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3651: yatāvat skandhādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ, so 'pi vyavahārasatyāśrita evetyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3652: [59-60] āryadharmasaṃgītau tavaduktam - bodhisattvena tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yo vyāvahārikatvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3663: [61] yacca tadā vastveva svīkṛtaṃ syādityuktaṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3664: [62-64] kā nāma saṃvṛtiryadi sarvamevāsaditi yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yuktisaṃṅgatam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3668: yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3670: athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ] bādhyate, sā saṃvṛtiriti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3672: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3679: naiva ca śaśaśṛṅgavat tadatyantābhāvasvabhāvamapi, avicārato ramaṇīyatvenāvabhāsamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3681: tattvānyatvayostāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tattvānyatvavirodha iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3684: ato bhāvamabhāvaṃ vā svabhāvamāśrita yattāvaccodyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirādhārameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3685: vastunyeva tāvad vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā sambhavī /
SA10ksmadhlu:3691: asāmarthādināṃ paramārthasatyāśritatvena sāmarthyādīnāṃ ca saṃvṛtisatyāśritatvena vyavasthīyamānatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3692: māyāpuruṣādivat sarvavastuṣu bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt krmaśaḥ satyadvayabhedo vyavasthāpyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3694: tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3695: māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ sampratipādyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3697: ato māyādivyavahāra ivāpekṣāviśeṣena satyadvayaśritā ime sarvavyavahārā aviruddhā evetyavaśyamabhyupetavyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3698: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā taimirikādyālambiteṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṃ ca dvayābhāseṣu kimivemāni codyāni na syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3699: itthaṃ yadīme keśādayaḥ paramārthato 'santa eva tadā kathamiva te sadrūpeṇāvabhāsante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3700: kathamiva ca deśakālāvasthānāṃ pṛthaṅ niścayaḥ parigṛhyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3701: utpādānutpādādayaḥ sadasatī ca parasparamekasmin naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3702: yato hi tatra yathā keśādiṣu dvayābhāseṣu ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthitasvabhāvasya saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyamāśritya saṃvṛtau sattvaṃ paramārthe cāsattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3704: tathaiva sarvavastūnāṃ sādṛśyena nedaṃ codyaṃ yujyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3706: teṣāmayamāśayaḥ - yena hetunā yathoktabhrāntanāṃ saṃvṛtasvabhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ naiva samyagutpādo jāyate tathāpyutpattisādṛśyamupadṛśyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3708: ata eva bhagavatā cāpyuktam - "bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3711: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3713: itthaṃ paramārthato 'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3714: ata ubhe api na sto 'sambaddhābhidhāne yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā bhavadbhirapi 'sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni' ityādīnāmarthaḥ kathamupanīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3715: kathaṃ vā bhavatāṃ satyadvayāśrito vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3716: yadi niyataṃ śabdārthamatiricya mithyaiva pare dūṣyante tadā spaṣṭamasambaddhāmevābhidhānaṃ parilakṣyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3718: yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi kalpitamevocyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3733: nāpi sarve 'rthāḥ sarvendriyagocarāḥ, kenacit kasyacideva grahaṇāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3734: ataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā,
SA10ksmadhlu:3737: kecana śāstraracayitāraḥ prasiddhimatītya kalpanādisvabhāvatvenipakalpitaṃ vastu mithyāsaṃvṛtisaditi kathayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3739: yattu pratītyasamutpadānukūlatvena parikalpitaṃ tattu" nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ" ityataḥ saṃvṛtisadevetyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3742: [66] yacca 'māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthaḥ' ityuktaṃ tadapyasatyārthe māyārthasya svīkārād doṣahitameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3745: nāpi cātra saṃkleśvyavadānāpavādadoṣo 'pi, tasya pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3749: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3752: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3755: ato mithyāsvabhāvatvājjñānasvarūpe 'ntarjñeyavādināṃ mate mahān viśeṣo [bhedaḥ] jāyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3756: [67] saṃvṛtiḥ śabdamātrātmiketyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣarūpeṇa svamatopakalpitmeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3763: teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3764: saṃjñā tāvadatra kalpanāmātrātmikaiva, tasyāmavabhāsyamānaṃ nāmaivābhidhānam, arthastvabhidheyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3768: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3770: sūtre 'pi paramārthasatyanirdeśasāmarthyena sarveṣāṃ jñānajñeyābhidhānādīnāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvena nirdiṣṭatvānnaiva te śabdamātratvena nirdiṣṭā iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3774: yato hi nirviśeṣaḥ anutpannaḥ aniruddhaḥ abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādirahitaḥ sa iti /"
SA10ksmadhlu:3780: evaṃvidhaḥ paramārthaḥ saṃvṛtisatyanivṛttasvabhāva iti nirdeśo 'pi kathamupapannaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3781: tatra paramārthatvena nirdiṣṭānāmārthānamavastubhūtānāṃ subhāṣitādivibhāgo 'pi naiva suśaka iti codyaṃ tāvat siddhasādhanameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3784: ataḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitatvena yadi tathatāsvabhāvo naiva vibhāgārhastadā naivāyaṃ kaścanāpi doṣa iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3785: ityevaṃ ye tāthāgatāgamāḥ pratyakṣaparokṣatayā paramārtathābhidhāyakā dehavatāṃ ca hitasukhajanakāste subhāṣitānītyucyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3786: tadviparītāni na subhāṣitānīti teṣāṃ bhedaḥ sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3787: bhavanmatānusāraṃ tavannāmnaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvatayopādānāt subhāṣitāsubhāṣitarupeṇa kathaṃ vyavasthā kriyate?
SA10ksmadhlu:3788: asmin bhavatāṃ yaduttaram, asmākamapi tathaiveti gauṇamevaitat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3789: yattāvacchabdārthetyādikamuktam, tadapi naiva yujyate, śabdārthayoḥ saṃvṛtimātratvābhāvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3791: yato hi abhidheyādisamastavastūni paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvena māyādivat parikalpitasvabhāvāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3793: tathaiva paramārthato niḥsvabhāvāni vastūni kathaṃ na vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyante?
SA10ksmadhlu:3794: viśeṣataḥ kevalaṃ vastusvabhāva eva śabdārthasāmānyasvarūpo bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tatra kimapi kāraṇaṃ naiva paśyāmaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3795: anādīti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vastubhūtaṃ tasyāpyasaditi sāmānyavyavahāro dṛśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3796: sukhādīni svasaṃvedyāṃ - nittyādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3797: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃvṛtyantargatatvāditi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva nirdeśaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3798: vastūni kevalamanidarśanasvabhāvāni eva bhaviṣyantīti yaduktaṃ tatrāpi nāsti kācana yuktiḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3800: sūtre 'pyabhidhānābhidheyādayaḥ saṃvṛtikāḥ, na tu satsvabhāvā nirdiṣṭā iti pūrvamuktameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3805: yatāvat paramārthe hyāropitasvabhāvaḥ sa saṃvṛtireva sa [paramārthastu] sarvaprapañcātītaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3808: yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet,
SA10ksmadhlu:3810: api ca, devaputra, paramārthataḥ paramarthasatyaṃ sarvavyavahārātītamiti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:3811: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto 'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī /
SA10ksmadhlu:3812: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo 'pyanubhūyatām,
SA10ksmadhlu:3813: kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3814: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati,
SA10ksmadhlu:3816: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3821: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho 'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3825: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:3827: so 'pi [svabhāva] tathāgataḥ syānnavā syāt sarvadā sthitatvānnityaḥ, ato nāsti siddhasādhanam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3832: satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3839: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3840: ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3842: yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3843: yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam?
SA10ksmadhlu:3845_0: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve 'pi
SA10ksmadhlu:3847: pramāṇādisarvavyāvasthāstavad vyavahāreṇaiveti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva, atastā gauṇā eva /
