SA10ksmadhlu:3848: [72] yāni vijñānādīni saṃvṛtibījāni tāni paramārthato 'ṅgīkarttavyānīti yaduktaṃ tanna yaktiyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3850: yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva,
SA10ksmadhlu:3852: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3853: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3854: nāpi viruddho hetuḥ, yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo 'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3855: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] katha tāḥ saṃvṛtaya iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3858: tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3859: [73] vastusvabhāvastāvat svīkriyata iti yaduktaṃ tattu yena kāraṇena vastusvabhāvaḥ svīkriyate tena satyadvayabhedānudhānaṃ kutrāpi naiva sidhyati /
SA10ksmadhlu:3861: teṣu ye utpādādayaḥ samāropyante te saṃvṛtisatyatvena vyāvasthāpyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3862: pramāṇaiḥ samyaṅ nirupya anāropitā ye tāvadanutpādādayaste paramārthasatyatayā vyāhriyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:3863: ataḥ paramārthato 'satyapi vastusvabhāve satyadvayaṃ vyāvasthāpyata eveti gauṇā eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3867: aviparītasya jñānasya artha iti viṣaya iti kṛtvā sā paramārtha ityucyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3868: yatkhalu viṣayi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tadanyaśbdārthaprayogairapi vyavahriyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3869: śravaṇamananabhāvanopajātāyāḥ prajñāyā anukūlatvād vyavahāreṇaiva sā evamabhidhīyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3870: tatra yena kāraṇena paramārthatattvalakṣaṇabhāvanayā yogibhiraśeṣasaṃkleśān parihatya uttarottaraprajñādiviśeguṇāṃścadhigamya mahārthatvaṃ prasādhyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3872: tadapi lokottaraṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sarvakalpanāvigatatvāt sarvadharmanirābhāsatvācca svasaṃvedyamanupalambhātmakaṃ ca,
SA10ksmadhlu:3875: anena vastuviṣayataḥ samyagatītatvena nirdeśādālambanadarśanasya niṣedha eva kṛtaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3879: yadyasti tāvadekaḥ tāvadekaḥ kaścana gauṇaḥ paramārthastadā nirvāṇaṃ tāvat kīdṛśaḥ paramārthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3880: tatra kasyāpi vastunaḥ samyaktayā arthasvabhāvasambhavābhāvāt tadapi kathamebhiścodyairanavamardanīyaṃ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3882: paramārthe vastūni tāvanna santīti yaduktaṃ tadapi paramārthamadhikṛtya jñānātmakatvaṃ samyagaviparītatvenāsadevetyuktam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3883: ekena khalu prakāreṇa paramārthastāvadasanniti yaduktaṃ tattattvato vicāreṇāsadevetyarthaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3884: [75] saṃvṛtiparamārthayorekatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatra bhagavān paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskāralakṣaṇena saha tattvato nānyaṃ nānanyamiti svayamevoktavān /
SA10ksmadhlu:3886: "yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [abhinna] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3888: yathā ca saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśalakṣaṇāstathaiva paramārtho 'pi saṃkleśalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3889: tathā ca yathā paramārthaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvabhinnastathā saṃskāralakṣaṇanyapi[abhinnāni] syuḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3892: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo 'pīti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3895: nimittabandhanairamuktatvānna ca te doṣṭhulyabandhanādapi muktāḥ syuḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3898: paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ yadi saṃskāralakṣaṇebhyo bhinnaṃ syāttadā na syāt paramārthaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam na ca paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā vā syāt,
SA10ksmadhlu:3902: paramārthalakṣaṇe tu niḥsvabhāvatvena tattvānyatvābhyaṃ vastu nābhidhātuṃ śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3903: vastusattve hi tattvānyatvabodhasya sambhavānna tu niḥsvabhāve vastuni tatsambhavaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:3905: jñānātmakaparamartho 'pi saṃvṛtyā saha tathatālakṣaṇe paramārthākāre ekatvena svīkriyata eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3910: jñānātmakastu paramārtho māyādibhirabhinnatvāt samyaksaṃvṛtisvabhāvaśca tattvāvabodhānukūlatvāt paramārthasvabhāvaśca /
SA10ksmadhlu:3914: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭaphalaṃ viśeṣaphalaṃ cābhinirharanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3917: paramārthato dānādivastūnāmabhāvāt tadupalambho viparīta eva, marīcyādiṣu jalopalambhavat /
SA10ksmadhlu:3918: atastatsamutthitapāramitānaṃ sarvo 'pi prayāso mithyātmātmīyasamutthitadānādivad aviśuddhahetusamutthitatvenātyantaṃ nirbala eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3921: ato 'nupalambhasamāśritesu dānādiṣu samyadṛṣṭisamutthitatayā vidvajjaneṣu śraddhaivotpadyate, na tvanyeṣu /
SA10ksmadhlu:3922: yena kāraṇena dānādiṣvapravṛteḥ puṇyābhāvastāni dātavyādīni naivātyantamasadbhūtāni,
SA10ksmadhlu:3924: naiva ca sarvadānupalambha eva, asamāhitāvasthāyāṃ māyādivat teṣāmupalambho 'pi /
SA10ksmadhlu:3927: kathaṃ bhagavan, upākuśalā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parisampadayanti?
SA10ksmadhlu:3929: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā parityajanti tadā māyābuddhireva ṭeṣāṃ dāne sūpatiṣṭhatīti" vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3930: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:3933: tadā te tatpravṛttiṃ naivāśrayante, samāhitāvasthāyāṃ dānādīnāmupekṣyamāṇatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3934: kintu pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāṃ tāvat te pravartanta eva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3939: ata eva prajñāpāramitādiṣvapi śūnyatādhimuktasya anupalambhāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni paripūrṇāni cetyuktāni /
SA10ksmadhlu:3941: "tatkiṃ manyate subhūte, sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgṛhītum?
SA10ksmadhlu:3955: yadarthaṃ hi pariṇāmanā vidhīyate tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvenaiva jñeyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3956: tat kimartham? dānaṃ tāvad dānasvabhāvena śūnyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3957: tathaiva upādātā deyaṃ dānaphalaṃ pariṇāmanā bodhiśceti tattasvabhāvena śūnyā iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3959: tad dānaṃ ca dānapāramiteti saṃjñāṃ pratilabhate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3960: na tu kadāpi malinā bhaviṣyati" iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3961: ityevamanupalambhasamāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni viśuddhāni ca bhānti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3964: [77] sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti yaducyate, tasya tāvatko 'rthaḥ?
SA10ksmadhlu:3965: yadyātmanāsattvānniḥsvabhāvāstadā siddhasādhanameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi yadyātmanā 'sattvānni' svabhāvatvena vyavastāpyate tadā na ca viruddhatvaṃ nāpi siddhasādhanamiti /
SA10ksmadhlu:3966: yato hi yadi vastunaḥ svabhāvo 'vipoarītatadā parāpekṣayā tatsattvam tatsattvam āditaścāsattvaṃ naivopapadyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:3968: phalatastāvadimāni vastūni paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parāpekṣitānītyato niḥsvabhāvanyeva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3969: na hi svabhāvasya kṛtakatvaṃ nāma yujyata iti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3970: na caisāṃ paramārthataḥ parāpekṣayāpi sattvamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam /
SA10ksmadhlu:3972: vyavahāre tāvadimāni paramāśritya pravartante, ato nityasattvādīnāmapi nasti prasaṅgaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:3973: evameva yadi vastvādīni prakṛtitaḥ sasvabhāvāni tadā svātmanāsattvaṃ svabhāvena ca sattvaṃ naivopapadyate, viruddhatvāt /
SA10ksmadhlu:3974: ekasmin vatūni sattvāsattvasthitāsthiotatvādayaḥ parasparaviruddhadharmā naiva yujyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3977: parikalpitātmanā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ tadā naiva siddhasādhanamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam,
SA10ksmadhlu:3980: sā ca saṃvṛtya yujyate, na tu grahyagrāhakasvabhāvatayā /
SA10ksmadhlu:3981: yaccāryāṇāṃ paramajñānagocaraṃ vastūnāmaviparītaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi naiva saditi yuktyagamābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipaditameva /
SA10ksmadhlu:3984: [78] sarvāṇi tāvad vastūnyādita ev notpannānityato 'nupannānīti yaduktaṃ tatra naiva siddhasādhanādayo doṣāḥ pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3985: yato hi sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato 'nādikāladeva praśāntatvādanutpannā ityabhyupagamyante,
SA10ksmadhlu:3992: parikalpitātmanā svātmanā vanutpāde 'pi naiva siddhasādhanamiti nirdiśyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:3996: sarve tāvad dharmā dharmadhātulakṣaṇāyāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ samarasatvena tathātākāratayā naiva viśeṣotpattirityato 'nutpattirabhyupagamyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4003: ye tāvadanekasūtravirodha iti kathayanti, tebhyaḥ pūrvameva dattamutaram /
SA10ksmadhlu:4004: [triyānasādhanam] yadapi sādhanaviśeṇa yānatrayasiddhayanumānaṃ śraddhāviśeṣeṇa ca gotraviśeṣānumānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tenāpi yanatrayaṃ sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4006: punaścanena yānatrayasādhanānumitasya gotratrayasyāpi niścitāvabodho naiva kartuṃ śakyaḥ,
SA10ksmadhlu:4008: sūtre 'pi - "evaṃ hi sati aparimitasya yānabhedasya yanabhedasyaprasaṅgaḥ syāt" - ityukyam /
SA10ksmadhlu:4009: yena khalu kāraṇena sattveṣu gotrabhedānumānasya niyatā siddhiḥ niyataśca śraddhabhedābodhaḥ pratīyate,
SA10ksmadhlu:4012: te 'pi kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4013: ye kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
SA10ksmadhlu:4014: ye khalvalpamātrake svasukhe hite cāsajyamānāḥ pareṣu daurmanasyaṃ dhārayanti,
SA10ksmadhlu:4020: ato gotrabhedasyāpyaniyatatayā kathaṃ tāvad yānatrayaniścayaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4021: sattvanāṃ vivuidhāśayavaśenāpi gotrabhedo niścetuṃ na śakyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4022: yāni tāvat pañcābhisamayagotrāṇi tānyapi ekaniścayābhiprāyeṇaiva nirdiṣṭāni, na tvātyantikatāyā /
SA10ksmadhlu:4023: tasminneva hi sūtre gotrāṇyanātyantikatayaiva nirdiṣṭāni / tathā hi -
SA10ksmadhlu:4025: punarapi tathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt kadācit karhicit kuśalamūlān vyutthāpayati /
SA10ksmadhlu:4026: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate, tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ" iti /
SA10ksmadhlu:4030: yato hi tathāgatā lokasya vividhāśayavaśena vividhāni yānāni nirdiśanto dharmopadeśe pravartante,
SA10ksmadhlu:4034: tadanantadameva tena aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4045: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ bodhisattvamārge pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4046: bhagavatāpi bālajanapraveśārthaṃ yānabhedo vyavasthāpitaḥ, na tu nītārthatayā nidiṣṭaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4050: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4051: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4054: ata eva āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtrādau ekayānanirdeśo naiva neyārtha iti pratipāditam tathā hi -
SA10ksmadhlu:4057: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ upāyajauśalyena tadaivaikaṃ buddhayanaṃ triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti" /
SA10ksmadhlu:4060: na hi śāriputra, tathāgatānāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4063: ye bhunti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
SA10ksmadhlu:4065: upāyametaṃ kurute svayambhū bauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
SA10ksmadhlu:4066: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha //
SA10ksmadhlu:4067: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
SA10ksmadhlu:4068: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathañci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaścayam //
SA10ksmadhlu:4069: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
SA10ksmadhlu:4070: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ //
SA10ksmadhlu:4071: pratoṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayambhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
SA10ksmadhlu:4072: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhāpeti //
SA10ksmadhlu:4073: mārtsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
SA10ksmadhlu:4074: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattva na mametu sādhu //
SA10ksmadhlu:4075: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtīyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
SA10ksmadhlu:4077: tatra prajvalitagṛhāntaḥsthitān bālajanān bahirniṣkāsayitumupāyabhūtasya vāhanaviśeṣasya dṛṣṭāntadvārā,
SA10ksmadhlu:4078: tadvadeva ratnadvīpasthitaṃ nāyakapuruṣaṃ nivartayitumupāyabhūtasya madhye 'raṇyaṃ nagaranirmāṇasya ca dṛṣṭāntadvārā bhagavān upāyabhūtāni yāni trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭavān,
